text_eng: Hotel Hadrigan in Vienna's district of Ottakring is a 15-minute ride on public transport away from the very heart of Vienna. Buses and trams stop in front of the house. The hotel offers free WiFi access in all rooms. The Hadrigan Hotel’s bright rooms are all accessible by lift and feature a safe, satellite TV, and a bathroom with a hairdryer. Ironing facilities are available at the 24-hour reception. A daily breakfast buffet is available for a surcharge, and a chargeable parking garage is 80 metres from the hotel. Tram line 46 and bus line 48A stop right outside and provide direct connections to the heart of Vienna. Tram line 10 goes to Dornbach with some small Heurigen wine taverns. The Wilhelminen Hospital is just 200 metres away. A supermarket is across the street, and many shops and restaurants are just steps away.
text_hr: Hotel Hadrigan nalazi se u bečkoj četvrti Ottakring, na 15 minuta vožnje linijama gradskog prijevoza od središta Beča. Ispred objekta je smješteno autobusno i tramvajsko stajalište. U svim hotelskim sobama dostupan je besplatni WiFi. Sve svijetle sobe hotela Hadrigan dostupne su dizalom. Sve jedinice uključuju sef, TV sa satelitskim programima i kupaonicu sa sušilom za kosu. Na recepciji otvorenoj 24 sata na raspolaganju su glačalo i stol za glačanje. Uz nadoplatu se poslužuje bife doručak. Uz nadoplatu gosti mogu koristiti i parkiralište u garaži udaljenoj 80 metara. Tramvajsko stajalište (linija 46) i autobusno stajalište (linija 48A) smješteni su neposredno ispred hotela. Ove linije prometuju izravno do središta Beča. Tramvajska linija 10 vozi do mjesta Dornbach s nekoliko malih vinskih konoba (Heuriger). Bolnica Wilhelminen udaljena je svega 200 metara. Supermarket se nalazi nasuprot hotelu, a u neposrednoj blizini dostupni su brojni restorani i trgovine.

text_eng:

Iskoristite mogućnosti za rekreaciju uz najam bicikala ili druge pogodnosti kao što su besplatan bežični pristup internetu i usluge recepcionara za osobne usluge (concierge). Gosti mogu koristiti prednosti koje uključuju poslovni centar, ekspresnu prijavu i ekspresnu odjavu. Na lokaciji se nudi samostalno parkiranje (podložno naknadama).

U kupaonicama su tuševi, a nude i sušila za kosu. Pogodnosti uključuju pisaće stolove i aparate za kavu/čaj, kao i telefona s besplatnim lokalnim pozivima.

text_eng:
We offer comfortable accommodation in the city center and at very reasonable prices. Whether traveling for business or leisure, the wide range of hotel services will make your stay unforgettable.
Only 400 metres away from Wenceslas Square and the National Musem, the Venezia is a small, budget hotel surrounded by shops, restaurants and café-bars. The hotel features 33 comfortably furnished, tastefully decorated rooms in the category of Double Economy, Triple, Family. Rooms have an en suite bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms are accessible by lift up to the third floor (out of four floors.) Free Wi-Fi is available in the lobby bar and in the rooms. Breakfast is served every day and you will find shops, restaurants and café-bars in the close vicinity. I.P. Pavlova metro and bus station are only 130 metres away from Hotel Venezia. Paid parking is available in the guarded garage located 100 meters away from the hotel. The 24-hour front desk can provide tickets for cultural and social events or sightseeing tours, as well as transfer service or a car rental.
text_hr: Hotel Venezia mali je, niskobudžetni hotel okružen trgovinama, restoranima i kafićima/barovima, smješten svega 400 metara od Vjenceslavova trga i Narodnog muzeja. Hotel nudi 33 udobno namještene, ukusno uređene sobe u kategoriji (dvokrevetne sobe Economy, trokrevetne i obiteljske). Sobe uključuju vlastitu kupaonicu s besplatnim kozmetičkim priborm i sušilom za kosu. Sobe su dostupne dizalom do 3. kata (od 4. kata). Besplatni WiFi dostupan je u baru u predvorju i sobama. Doručak se poslužuje svakodnevno, a u blizini su smještene trgovine, restorani i kafići. Postaja podzemne željeznice i autobusno stajalište I.P. Pavlova udaljeni su samo 130 metara od hotela Venezia. Parkiralište uz nadoplatu na raspolaganju je u garaži pod nadzorom na 100 metara od hotela. Na recepciji otvorenoj 24 sata dnevno moguće je kupiti ulaznice za kulturološke i društvene događaje ili izlete te uslugu prijevoza i najma automobila.

Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6:30 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including an indoor pool, a sauna, and a fitness center. Additional amenities at this hotel include wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands. Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and express check-in. Planning an event in Berlin? This hotel has facilities measuring 16145 square feet (1500 square meters), including a meeting room. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.
																Make yourself at home in one of the 336 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature hair dryers and slippers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.
text_hr:

Ovaj hotel nudi dodatne pogodnosti koje uključuju bežični pristup internetu (uz nadoplatu), usluge recepcionara za osobne usluge (concierge) i suvenirnice / novinske kioske. The historic 16th-century building of the Hotel Gold features elegantly furnished en-suite rooms, fitted with a TV, a minibar and a telephone. text_eng:
The depandance surrounded by nature, offers a peaceful getaway for families, nature lovers and everybody, who prefers peaceful place with easy access to centre.
Located next to the Košíře - Motol Park featuring the Golf Club Praha course, the Hotel Golf Depandance offers accommodation with air condition and free WiFi. The rooms are fitted with a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer. Guest can dine at the Hotel Golf's restaurant that serves Czech and international cuisine and is located in the main building, 50 metres from Hotel Golf Depandance. A Billa grocery shop can be reached in 10 minutes by bus and a shopping centre is a 10-minute tram ride away. Guests of the Hotel Golf Depandance can use facilities of the Hotel Golf. A sauna and hot tub are available for a surcharge, while a fitness centre is provided for free. Luggage storage and a 24-hour front desk . The Wenceslas Square can be visited 6 km from the hotel, the Charles Bridge and the Prague Castle are both 5 km away. The Hotel Golf Tram Stop is located 50 metres away and the Motol Bus Stop is a 7-minute walk away. The Václav Havel Airport Prague is 15 km from the hotel.
text_hr: Hotel Golf Dependance nalazi se neposredno uz park prirode Košíře - Motol, u sklopu kojeg je smješten i golf-teren Golf kluba Prag. Objekt nudi klimatiziran smještaj i besplatan WiFi. Sve sobe uključuju TV ravnog ekrana sa satelitskim programima te vlastitu kupaonicu s tušem i sušilom za kosu. U restoranu hotela Golf, smještenom u glavnoj zgradi udaljenoj 50 metara od hotela Golf Depandance, poslužuju se jela češke i međunarodne kuhinje. Do trgovine Billa ima 10 minuta vožnje autobusom, a do trgovačkog centra 10 minuta vožnje tramvajem. Gosti hotela Golf Depandance mogu koristiti sadržaje hotela Golf. Uz nadoplatu su dostupne sauna i hidromasažna kada, a u fitness-centru gosti mogu vježbati besplatno. Hotel obuhvaća spremište prtljage i recepciju otvorenu 24 sata. Objekt je smješten 6 km od Vjenceslavova trga te 5 km od Karlova mosta i Praškog dvorca. Tramvajsko stajalište Hotel Golf udaljeno je 50 metara, a autobusno stajalište Motol 7 minuta hoda. Zračna luka Václav Havel - Prag nalazi se na 15 km.

Wind down with a drink at one of the 3 bars/lounges or 2 poolside bars. Buffet breakfasts are served on weekdays from 6:30 AM to 10:00 AM and on weekends from 7:00 AM to 11:00 AM for a fee. Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages and body treatments. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find outdoor tennis courts, an indoor pool, and a sauna. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and shopping on site. Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. This hotel has 13 meeting rooms available for events. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.
																Make yourself at home in one of the 198 guestrooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.
text_hr:
Objedujte u restoranu RESTAURANT GALERIE PRAHA, jednom od brojnih ugostiteljskih objekata u ponudi u ovaj hotel, u kojoj se nalazi 5 restorana i kavana/kafić. Opustite se uz piće u jednom od 3 bara/salona ili 2 bara uz bazen.Doručak (švedski stol) poslužuje se radnim danima od 6.30 do 10.00 i vikendom od 7.00 do 11.00 uz nadoplatu. Uživajte u posjetu spa centru koji nudi masaže i tretmani za tijelo. Ako tražite rekreacijske mogućnosti, naći ćete ih uz vanjske teniske terene, unutarnji bazen i saunu. Ovaj hotel nudi dodatne pogodnosti koje uključuju besplatan bežični pristup internetu, usluge recepcionara za osobne usluge (concierge) i trgovinu u sklopu objekta. Gosti mogu koristiti prednosti koje uključuju poslovni centar, ekspresnu prijavu i ekspresnu odjavu. Ovaj objekt (ovaj hotel) ima 13 prostorije za sastanke u kojima se mogu organizirati razna događanja. Na lokaciji se nudi samostalno parkiranje (podložno naknadama).
																Osjećajte se kao kod kuće u jednoj od klimatiziranih soba (ukupno 198), koje nude minibarove. Zabavljat će vas satelitskim TV, a ostat ćete povezani sa svijetom uz besplatan bežični pristup internetu. U kupaonicama su kade ili tuševi, a nude i sušila za kosu. U pogodnosti su uključeni telefoni, sef i pisaći stolovi.

text_eng:
A complimentary hot/cold buffet breakfast is served daily from 7 AM to 10 AM. Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a television in a common area. Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-in, and express check-out. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available 24 hours) and a train station pick-up service.
																Make yourself at home in one of the 29 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Your Select Comfort bed comes with premium bedding. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature designer toiletries and hair dryers.

Gosti mogu koristiti prednosti koje uključuju računalo, ekspresnu prijavu i ekspresnu odjavu. Uz nadoplatu se nudi prijevoz od/do zračne luke (dostupno 24 sata) i prijevoz od željezničkog kolodvora.

Vaš krevet ima udoban madrac (krevetu s madracem Select Comfort) i luksuzna posteljina. Zabavljat će vas satelitskim TV, a ostat ćete povezani sa svijetom uz besplatan bežični pristup internetu. Privatne kupaonice opremljene su kadama ili tuševima, a nude i dizajnerske toaletne potrepštine te sušila za kosu.

text_eng:
Hotel U Prince, a remarkable World Heritage Site, is located in the heart of Prague. Guests can enjoy the unique historical atmosphere from our rooftop restaurant Terasa U Prince which offers savory Czech and international cuisines and an exquisite panoramic view of the Old Town Square with its Astronomical Clock.

Hotel U Prince is also proud to mention that its renown Black Angels Bar ranked among the top 4 hotel bars around the world at the prestigious Tales of the Cocktails awards in New Orleans, Louisiana  in 2014.
Situated right on Old Town Square opposite the Astronomical Clock, the uniquely styled hotel U Prince is housed in a completely renovated 12th-century building. You will be welcomed with a glass of sparkling wine. The U Prince hotel offers rooms with antique furniture and magnificent views over the Golden City from the roof terrace. Traditional Czech specialities as well as delicious dishes of the international cuisine are served in the restaurant and on the terrace. The award-winning Black Angel Bar, located in the basement of the hotel, will offer you a wide choice of quality drinks in a stylish ambience. Room service is at your disposal 24 hours a day and a covered parking lot is located approximately 500 metres from the hotel.
text_hr: Jedinstveno uređen hotel U Prince smješten je u potpuno obnovljenoj zgradi iz 12. stoljeća, na samom Starogradskom trgu, nasuprot Astronomskom satu. Gosti po dolasku dobivaju čašu pjenušavog vina. Hotel U Prince nudi sobe s elegantnim namještajem i krovnu terasu s veličanstvenim pogledom na Zlatni grad. Tradicionalni češki specijaliteti i ukusna jela međunarodne kuhinje poslužuju se u restoranu i na terasi. U elegantnom ozračju nagrađivanog bara Black Angel, koji je smješten u podrumu hotela, gosti mogu uživati u bogatom izboru kvalitetnih pića. Posluga u sobu na raspolaganju je 24 sata dnevno. Natkriveno parkiralište udaljeno je približno 500 metara od hotela.

																Make yourself at home in one of the 38 guestrooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Gosti mogu koristiti prednosti koje uključuju usluge kemijskog čišćenja / pranja rublja, 24-satno radno vrijeme recepcije i višejezično osoblje. Uz nadoplatu se nudi prijevoz od/do zračne luke (dostupno 24 sata) i prijevoz od željezničkog kolodvora.
																Osjećat ćete se kao kod kuće u jednoj od soba (ukupno 38) koje sadrže minibarove i LCD televizore. Do you like the idea of enjoying a lively, bustling city while staying in a quiet neighborhood, only a few minutes away from all the action?

Hotel Meda is names after the famous Czech art collector and owner of the Kampa Museum, Meda Mladkova. It retains the charm of a small family owned hotel built in the 1930's, but with 21st century conveniences.
The Hotel Meda is located 2 metro stops from Charles Bridge and the Old Town. The metro stop is just 200 metres away and Václav Havel Airport Prague is reachable within 25 minutes. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. All the most important sights can be reached easily. Private parking is possible in front of the Hotel Meda.
text_hr: Hotel Meda nalazi se na 2 postaje vožnje podzemnom željeznicom od Karlovog mosta i stare gradske jezgre. Postaja podzemne željeznice udaljena je samo 200 metara, a Zračna luka Vaclav Havel u Pragu 25 minuta od objekta. Gostima je dostupan besplatni WiFi u cijelom hotelu. Sve najvažnije znamenitosti lako su dostupne. Privatno parkiralište nalazi se ispred hotela Meda.

text_eng:
The Kursaal Bern is an all-in-one enterprise comprising a state-of-the-art congress center,4-star superior Lifestyle Hotel Allegro, 3 in-house restaurants and bars, exhibitions, trade fairs, external events and a Casino.
Located in the centre of Bern, with an exceptional view of the medieval Old Town and the impressive Alps, the 4-star superior Hotel Allegro Bern features a casino, 3 restaurants, 1 bar and 3 terraces. Free WiFi is available. All rooms at the Hotel Allegro are of distinctive design and décor, and many offer panoramic views of Bern and the distant Alps. The Gourmet Restaurant Meridiano is situated on the 6th floor and specializes in authentic European cuisine made from the finest natural ingredients. The Chef is Fabian Raffeiner, whose culinary creations have earned 16 Gault Millau Points. The Meridiano also features a Michelin star. At the Restaurant Yù you will get over 30 Asian gourment specialities at the popular Asian Dream Buffet, while the Restaurant Giardino offers fine Italian cuisine. The Allegro bar offers fine drinks and, in summer, a stylish lounge area with views of the pond. A smoker's lounge is also available. Guests have free access to the fitness centre with cardio machines. Massages can be organised on request and for a surcharge. At a surcharge, guests can rent bicycles. Underground parking is available for a surcharge. The Bern-Wankdorf motorway exit is 2 km away, and the main train station is 5 minutes away on tram line 9, stopping directly in front of the hotel. Guests benefit from free public transport in Bern.

text_eng: The Hotel Alexander is located right at the Messe Basel fairgrounds and the Congress Centre, a 7-minute ride from the centre of Basel. The tram stop is right outside. Free Wi-Fi is available. The restaurant Alexander serves Swiss specialties and offers different Pizza varieties and delivery service in the hotel. All rooms at the Alexander Hotel have an en-suite bathroom and are equipped with digital TV, a desk and a coffee machine. A coffee capsule is offered in the room on arrival and a complimentary bottle of mineral water is provided every day. The SBB Train Station is 7 minutes by tram from the hotel, and the Badischer Bahnhof Train Station is 3 minutes away. Basel-Mulhouse Airport can be reached in a 15-minute drive. The booking confirmation serves as a public transportation ticket on the day of arrival, from the railway station SBB or Badischer Bahnhof or from the EuroAirport to the hotel.
text_hr: Hotel Alexander nalazi se uz sajam i kongresni centra Messe Basel, nasuprot tramvajskom stajalištu i na 7 minuta vožnje od centra grada Basela. Gostima je na raspolaganju besplatni WiFi. U restoranu Alexander poslužuju se švicarski specijaliteti te razne pizze, a dostupna je i usluga dostave u okviru hotela. Sve sobe hotela Alexander uključuju vlastitu kupaonicu, TV s digitalnim programima, radni stol i aparat za pripremu kave. Po dolasku u sobu goste očekuje kapsula kave, a svakog dana na raspolaganju im je besplatna boca mineralne vode. Do željezničkog kolodvora SBB ima 7 minuta vožnje tramvajem, a do željezničkog kolodvora Badischer Bahnhof 3 minute vožnje. Zračna luka Basel-Mulhouse udaljena je 15 minuta vožnje. Potvrdu rezervacije gosti mogu koristiti kao kartu za javni prijevoz na dan dolaska. Potvrdu je moguće koristiti za prijevoz sa željezničkih kolodvora SBB i Badischer Bahnhof ili iz zračne luke EuroAirport. Na zahtjev gosti mogu dobiti pristupne kodove za sve lokacije s javno dostupnim bežičnim pristupom internetu (WiFi) u Baselu.

text_eng:
Our hotel is very well situated in the heart of Geneva center just in front of the train station.
Such a cozy hotel with all rooms recently renovated( Bed, Mattress, TV, Mouquette....etc.) .
Very variable and rich buffet breakfast with a high standard of quality.
Hôtel Astoria is located in the heart of Geneva, facing the Cornavin Train Station and close to the business quarters and the UN, the UNHCR, the WTO and the WHO. Free WiFi is available. The air-conditioned rooms come with a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar, and a bathroom. An internet point is available in the lobby free of charge. The Britannia Pub is one of the first typical English-style pubs ever established in Geneva. The experienced staff provides for a relaxed atmosphere, where you can enjoy a nice chat and your favourite beer surrounded by soul or jazz music. The Pub also serves daily lunch and dinner. Geneva International Airport is easily reachable within 15 minutes by train from the Astoria Hotel. The central urban bus station is located opposite the hotel, at the train station. At the reception, tickets for the train station parking are available at a 40% discount.
text_hr: Hotel Astoria smješten je u srce Ženeve, nasuprot Željezničkog kolodvora Cornavin te u neposrednoj blizini poslovne četvrti i UN-a, agencije UNHCR, Svjetske trgovinske organizacije i Svjetske zdravstvene organizacije. Dostupan je besplatni WiFi. Klimatizirane sobe sadrže TV ravnog ekrana sa satelitskim programima, mini bar i kupaonicu. U predvorju je besplatno na raspolaganju računalo s internetom. Pub Britannia jedan je od prvih tipičnih engleskih pubova u Ženevi. U opuštenom ozračju gosti mogu uživati zahvaljujući iskusnom osoblju ili mogu pročavrljati i popiti omiljeno pivo uz zvukove soula i jazza. Ovdje se svakodnevno poslužuju ručak i večera. Međunarodna zračna luka Ženeva udaljena je 15 minuta vožnje vlakom od hotela Astoria. Glavni gradski autobusni kolodvor smješten je uz željeznički kolodvor, nasuprot hotela. Na recepciji su dostupne parkirališne karte s popustom u iznosu od 40% za parkiralište na željezničkom kolodvoru.

Since 1906: hospitality and historic charm nestled among the city, arts and lake
Right on the shore of Lake Lugano, the 3-star superior International au Lac Historic Lakeside Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms, a garden with an outdoor pool, free WiFi, and a lobby bar. The Old Town of Lugano, featuring several restaurants, bars and shops, is just a short walk away. An internet workstation and an ethernet connection for notebook computers are available free of charge at the lobby bar. A private underground car park can be used at an additional cost. The traditional International au Lac Historic Lakeside Hotel includes an exhibition about its 100-year history. The Church of Santa Maria degli Angeli, dating from 1515 and featuring a famous fresco by Bernardino Luini, is located just next to the hotel.

text_eng: The Hotel Kreuz + Post enjoys a central location, 20 metres from the Grindelwald Train Station, close to many shops. It offers several restaurant, free WiFi, a wellness area with rooftop terrace and panoramic views of the Alps. All rooms offer panoramic mountain views and come with a flat-screen TV, a minibar, a radio and a telephone. Slippers and bathrobes are provided as well. In the various restaurants and in the panorama dining room you can enjoy traditional as well as modern cuisine. The Aqua Relax Wellness Oasis features low-temperature infrared cabin, a sauna, a steam bath, a whirlpool and teak-wood sun loungers, free of use for guests. Guests of the Hotel Kreuz + Post also have free access to the nearby sports centre with an indoor swimming pool. Free parking is possible on site. Children can have fun in the playroom and there is also a library and a bright meeting room.

Sve sobe nude panoramski pogled na planinu, a sadrže TV ravnog ekrana, minibar, radio i telefon. Na raspolaganju su ogrtači i papuče. Razni restorani i blagovaonica s panoramskim pogledom poslužuju tradicionalna jela i modernu kuhinju. Besplatni wellness-centar Aqua Relax Wellness Oasis sadrži infracrvenu kabinu niske temperature, saunu, parnu kupku, hidromasažnu kadu i ležaljke od tikovine. Gosti hotela Kreuz + Post također imaju besplatan pristup obližnjem sportskom centru s unutarnjim bazenom. Objekt nudi besplatno parkiralište. Most rooms offer a balcony or a terrace with a beautiful view of the Engadine mountains. Hotel Europa St. Moritz features free access to the spa and indoor swimming area. text_eng: The Hôtel de la Paix is located in the heart of Lausanne, enjoying one of the best locations in the city and magnificently overlooking Lake Geneva and the Alps. Its high quality and personalised service, the attentive and efficient staff and the comfort and tranquility of its tastefully furnished and recently renovated rooms make the Hôtel de la Paix a favourite among business travelers and tourists in Lausanne. The conference centre on the first floor, offering a wonderful view of the lake and the Alps, responds to guests’ every need with a high level of flexibility. The business centre of Lausanne as well as many shops and the public transportation network are just outside the hotel. A free public transportation card (bus, metro) will be provided to all our guests upon arrival.

The old town of Plovdiv boasts the typical National Revival style, with the well-preserved Roman Theatre as a most attractive place for various cultural events. The property's location makes the Maritza a preferred business hotel during the exhibitions and other national and international events. The Philipopolis Restaurant, which seats up to 200 people, serves delicious local as well as international cuisine. Hotel Maritza zbog svoje lokacije idealan je za poslovne putnike u vrijeme održavanja izložbi te drugih nacionalnih i međunarodnih događanja. text_eng: Surrounded by pine forests, this hotel is situated in Borovets, 50 metres from the gondola lift and 250 metres from drag lifts. It houses a spa centre and numerous restaurants. At 1,300 metres above sea level, the alpine-style Hotel Samokov is 1 hour's drive from Sofia. It features a bowling alley as well as billiards and table tennis facilities. The state-of-the-art thermal area includes a hammam, steam bath, Finnish sauna, foot baths with sea salts, a Kneipp pool and a relax area. There is a gym, an indoor swimming pool and a beauty centre with cosmetic treatments and a hairdresser. The rooms are equipped with minibars, satellite TV and bathtubs. The balconies boast mountain views. Hotel Samokov's Panorama Restaurant serves buffet breakfast and dinner as well as an à la carte menu. The Barbecue Terrace next to the swimming pool offers grilled specialities, fresh salads and refreshing drinks. The Samokov has a lobby bar serving cakes, sweets and various cocktails as well as a Sports Bar next to the gym.
text_hr: Hotel Samokov smješten je usred borove šume u skijalištu Borovets, 50 metara od žičare s kabinama i 250 metara od vučnice. U okviru hotela dostupni su spa centar i brojni restorani. Hotel Samokov nalazi se na nadmorskoj visini od 1300 metara, na 1 sat vožnje od grada Sofije. U sklopu ovog objekta uređenog u alpskom stilu gosti mogu igrati biljar i stolni tenis. U suvremeno uređenim toplicama gosti se mogu opustiti u hamamu, parnoj kupki, kupkama s morskom soli za stopala, Kneippovoj kadi i u zoni za opuštanje. Također su na raspolaganju unutarnji bazen te kozmetički centar koji nudi razne tretmane uljepšavanja i frizerski salon. Sve sobe sadrže mini bar, TV sa satelitskim programima i kadu. Također obuhvaćaju balkon s pogledom na planinu. U restoranu Panorama u sklopu hotela Samokov poslužuju se bife doručak, večera i jela po narudžbi. U restoranu Barbecue Terrace, smještenom uz bazen, gosti mogu uživati u specijalitetima s roštilja, svježim salatama i osvježavajućim pićima. U baru u prizemlju hotela Samokov poslužuju se kolači, slatkiši i razni kokteli, a uz teretanu je smješten i sportski bar.

text_eng:
Did you know that Sofia is one of the fewest cities in the world that has operational Orthodox church, Muslim mosque and Jewish synagogue placed in a close triangle within 2 minutes walk by foot from each other? Religious tolerance and peaceful coexistence is something of a tradition in Bulgaria, and a very high-minded to say at least. Did you know that the hotel is located exact in that cross of religious tolerance? If not, just book our hotel and you will only walking distance of all historical, cultural and religional places. And not only this but you will be accommodated in magnificent building displaying fabulous old style architecture from the end of the XIX century, recorded in Ministry of culture as cultural monumental building.
Located on the pedestrian shopping street Pirotska, a 5-minute walk from the centre of Sofia and 350 metres away from Serdika Subway Station, Sveta Sofia Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. A fitness centre is available for free, while the sauna, the solarium and the massages are available at a surcharge. Guests are provided with one-time free access to Victoria SPA thermal zone and indoor pool. Each room is equipped with a TV with cable channels, and a minibar. Some units come with a seating area with a sofa. The en-suite bathroom is equipped with a shower or a bath, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Sveta Sofia Hotel houses a restaurant. Special diet menus and grocery delivery are organised upon request. A wide range of restaurants, bars, cafeterias and grocery shops can be reached in a 5 to а 10-minute walk. Sofia Market Hall and the famous Women's Market can be reached in 300 to 500 metres. Sofia Airport is set 9.3 km away. Shuttle services are offered by the Sveta Sofia Hotel upon request and at a surcharge.

text_eng:
Welcome to Novotel Leuven Centrum your home away from home. Our team is excited to welcome you and make your stay as comfortable as possible. Enjoy our modern spacious rooms and try one of our delicious dishes in the Gourmet Bar.
Located in Leuven, this Novotel offers modern rooms with free WiFi and a tea-and-coffee maker. Leuven's Market Square is a 15-minute walk away, while the train station is just 7 minutes away. Guests can work out in the fitness room or indulge in a relaxing steam bath. Sip your favourite drink in the cosy hotel bar and dine in the gourmet bar before enjoying the bustling nightlife the city has to offer. The modern Novotel Leuven Centrum is set in a perfect location to discover historical centre of Leuven and sites such as the famous 15th century Town Hall, built in a Gothic architectural style. Leuven Central Railway Station and the highway are in the vicinity to explore the wider surrounding areas and local cities such as Brussels and Mechelen, within a 30-minute drive away by car. Novotel Leuven Centrum is a 20-minute drive away from Brussels Airport.

ALERT! Please contact the hotel directly for detailed route description due to city road changes. 

Experience Ghent Marriott: a top location, personalized services and state of the art equipment. Flexible meeting venue and services complemented by Marriott's renowned meeting expertise. Free Wi-Fi in the entire hotel.
The elegant Ghent Marriott combines historic charm with modern design. This hotel overlooks the famous Korenlei on the bank of the Lys River and boasts an unusual lobby, a fitness centre and free WiFi. The air-conditioned rooms at Ghent Marriott Hotel include a seating area and flat-screen cable TV with pay-per-view films. Guests can get drinks and snacks at the property or make themselves a tea or coffee. Saint Bavo Square, which features the Belfry, is less than a 10-minute walk from the hotel. The Design Museum is 100 metres away. Marriott Hotel is only 5 minutes’ walk from Gravensteen Castle. Guests can also rent bicycles at the hotel to explore the area. Poppi Coffee & Wine Bar serves classic dishes throughout the day and cocktails in the evening. Midtown Grill is serving up the finest USDA certified steaks. The emphasis is on pureness, fresh ingredients and quality with a local touch. The restaurant has a warm ambiance from the 30s with an amazing view over the river Lys. In the summer they offer outdoor seating on the riverside terrace.

Cour St Georges offers rooms in an 18th-century building in Gent’s historic centre, within a 3-minute walk from the Saint Bavo's Cathedral, the Belfry and Saint Nicholas' Church. It features a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. All of the rooms at Cour St Georges benefit from original features such as wooden beams. The rooms also include cable TV, a work desk and a minibar. Every morning, guests can start their day in Ghent with a wholesome breakfast at the Cour St Georges. In the immediate surroundings of the hotel you can find a wide range of restaurants for lunch or dinner. Alijn House is a 5-minute walk from Cour St Georges. Ghent St Peter's Train Station is 3 km away from the hotel. The Gravensteen is a 5-minute walk (450 metres) and St Peter's Square and Abbey are 1.5 km.

text_eng:
Flanders Hotel occupies the premises of a former 'Grand Hotel' and monastery, dating back to 1235 AD. While retaining part of their features, the hotel's guests enjoy contemporary surroundings and modern comforts, as well as personable service from a dedicated team of staff! Being located within the old city center, just outside of the hustle and bustle, it's just a few minutes' stroll to the central squares. As well as a private parking facility, there is an indoor pool and popular lounge bar with terrace.
Guests staying at the centrally yet tranquilly located Flanders Hotel enjoy free WiFi, a heated indoor pool and an extensive breakfast buffet. The property is set in the centre of Bruges, just 650 metres from Market Square. All rooms at Flanders Hotel include satellite TV with international programming and in-room hot drinks facilities. The en-suite bathroom features free toiletries. Each morning, breakfast is served in the dining room overlooking a terrace with a pond. The buffet includes freshly baked bread, scrambled eggs, bacon and fresh fruit. Guests can also enjoy locally brewed beers or cocktails in the on-site bar. Many restaurants are located in the vicinity of the accommodation. The Concert Hall is just over a 15-minute walk from Hotel Flanders and the Groeninge Museum is a 10-minute walk away. Bruges Railway Station is 2 km from the hotel.

text_eng:
The Leopold Hotel Brussels EU is family owned for 35 years and is run by Richard & Christine along with an experienced team of happy and cheerful staff
With 1 restaurant and an all-weather garden terrace, Hotel Leopold offers a fine setting for a stay in Brussels. The European Parliament can be reached within less than a 3-minute walk. The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a work desk and seating area. Breakfast is available in the breakfast room, which is decorated with plants and has an opening glass roof. It consists of a large hot and cold buffet with fresh Italian coffee, as well as a selection of teas. Guests can enjoy a pasta buffet and Belgian meals in the Leopold brasserie. For gourmet dining, the L'Ange Corner offers an international menu. Drinks are served in the English-style Tavern Bar. The Hotel Leopold Brussels is located a 5-minute walk from the Trone Metro Station. You can reach the European Commission and the Magritte Museum in a 12-minute walk. The Airport Express Bus stops 150 metres from the hotel.

Doručak se poslužuje u blagovaonici hotela, koja je ukrašena biljkama te ima stakleni krov s mogućnošću otvaranja. Ovdje možete uživati u velikom švedskom stolu s toplim i hladnim jelima, svježoj talijanskoj kavi te izboru čajeva. Taverna Leopold nudi švedski stol s tjesteninom i jela belgijske kuhinje. Gurmanski jelovnik s jelima međunarodne kuhinje dostupan je u restoranu L'Ange Corner, a pića se poslužuju u konobi uređenoj u engleskom stilu. Hotel Leopold Brussels EU nalazi se na 5 minuta hoda od postaje podzemne željeznice Trone. Zgrada Europske komisije i muzej Magritte udaljeni su 12 minuta hoda. Stajalište za linije autobusa Airport Express, koje polaze prema zračnoj luci, smješteno je 150 metara od hotela.

text_eng: Heritage Hotel is located in the car-free historic centre of the UNESCO World Heritage town of Hallstatt in Upper Austria's Salzkammergut region. It offers free wired internet access in the rooms and free WiFi in all areas. Consisting of 3 carefully renovated, historic buildings, Heritage Hotel Hallstatt features a bar and a sunny lakeside terrace. There is also a café with a winter garden right next to Hallstatt's boat landing. The hotel’s restaurant Im Kainz offers traditional Austrian dishes and fine wines. All rooms and suites at Heritage Hotel offer views of the town and Lake Hallstatt. The rooms are all individually furnished and feature cable TV, a minibar, and tea and coffee-making facilities. Haus Kainz is the main building, with the breakfast room, the café and the bar, as well as a sauna, an infrared cabin and a lift. Haus Stocker is Hallstatt's oldest (more than 400 years) building and truly unique. Haus Stocker is a 3-minute walk away from the main building. Haus Seethaler enjoys a hillside location and offers panoramic lake views. It is a 5-minute walk away from the main building. Haus Stocker and Haus Seethaler have no lift. All guests of the Heritage Hotel get bathrobes, slippers and toiletries free of charge. Parking is possible for a charge in the P1 parking area outside the town. From there, free shuttle bus to the hotel is available.
text_hr: Hotel Heritage smješten je u pješačkoj zoni povijesne jezgre UNESCO-m zaštićenog grada Hallstatta, u regiji Salzkammergut Gornje Austrije. Hotel nudi žučni pristup internetu u sobama i besplatni WiFi u svim prostorijama. Hotel Heritage Hallstatt sastoji se od 3 pažljivo obnovljene povijesne zgrade te ukljupčuje bar i terasu za sunčanje uz jezero. Neposredno uz brodsko pristanište Hallstatta nalazi se kafić sa zimskim vrtom. U hotelskom restoranu Im Kainz poslužuju se jela tradicionalne austrijske kuhinje i vrhunska vina. Sve sobe i suiteovi hotela Heritage imaju pogled na grad i jezero Hallstatt. Sve su sobe individualno uređene te uključuju TV s kabelskim programima, minibar i pribor za pripremu kave/čaja. Glavna hotelska zgrada Haus Kainz sadrži salu za doručak, kafić, bar, saunu, infracrvenu kabinu i dizalo. Jedinstvena zgrada Haus Stocker najstarija je zgrada hotela Hallstatt i izgrađena je prije više od 400 godina. Zgrada Haus Stocker udaljena je 3 minute hoda od glavne zgrade. Zgrada Haus Seethaler nalazi se na padini brda i nudi panoramski pogled na jezero. Od glavne je zgrade udaljena 5 minuta hoda. Zgrade Haus Stocker i Haus Seethaler nemaju dizalo. Svi gosti hotela Heritage besplatno mogu koristiti ogrtače, papuče i kozmetički pribor. Gosti uz nadoplatu mogu koristiti parkiralište u parkirališnoj zoni P1, smješteno izvan grada. Otamo je moguće koristiti besplatnu uslugu prijevoza hotelskim autobusom do hotela.

text_eng: Hotel Haus Am See is the only hotel in Obertraun which is located directly at Lake Hallstatt. It offers a private bathing jetty as well as panoramic views of the lake, the town of Hallstatt and the impressive Dachstein Mountains. Hallstatt can be reached in a 5-minute drive or by a ferry leaving next to the hotel. The rooms at Hotel Haus Am See all come with luxurious box spring beds and a TV and offer mountain or lake views. Free WiFi is provided. In fine weather, breakfast is served on the terrace overlooking the lake. Various restaurant options for lunch and dinner are close by. Guests can rent kayaks to explore the scenic surroundings of the Hallstatt-Dachstein-Salzkammergut UNESCO World Heritage Site. Furthermore the property is an ideal starting point for several activities, such as mountain biking, hiking and scuba diving in summer, and ski shoe hiking and skiing in winter. The Dachstein-Krippenstein Cable Car is a 5-minute drive away.
text_hr: Hotel Haus Am See jedini je hotel u Obertraunu smješten uz jezero Hallstatt. Iz objekta se pruža panoramski pogled na jezero, grad Hallstatt i prekrasne planine Dachstein. U sklopu hotela dostupan je privatni mol za kupanje. Hallstatt je udaljen 5 minuta vožnje ili plovidbe trajektom koji polazi s pristaništa pored hotela. Sobe u hotelu Haus Am See sadrže luksuzne krevete s madracima s oprugama, TV i pogled na planinu ili jezero. Dostupan je besplatni WiFi. Za lijepa vremena doručak se poslužuje na terasi s pogledom na jezero. U neposrednoj se blizini nalaze razni restorani, u kojima gosti mogu uživati u ručku i večeri. Gosti mogu unajmiti kajak i istražiti slikovito područje Hallstatt-Dachstein-Salzkammergut, koje je uvršteno na popis UNESCO-ve Svjetske kulturne baštine. Objekt se nalazi na izvrsnoj lokaciji za uživanje u raznim aktivnostima, poput brdskog biciklizma, pješačenja i ronjenja s bocom u ljetnim mjesecima te skijanja i zimskog pješačenja tijekom zime. Žičara Dachstein-Krippenstein udaljena je 5 minuta vožnje.

text_eng: Hotel Erzherzog Johann enjoys a quiet location in the centre of Bad Aussee, in the Styrian part of the Salzkammergut. It offers rooms with balcony and free internet access. This elegant, traditional hotel features a large spa area with mountain views and a wide range of therapy, wellness and beauty programmes. The award-winning restaurant serves Styrian dishes with products from surrounding farms. It also offers a wide range of high-quality wines. In fair weather you can dine in the rose garden on the terrace. Half-board also includes an afternoon snack. Parking is available free of charge at the Erzherzog Johann. Various shops and cafés, as well as a congress centre, are only a few steps away. Many cycling and hiking trails are nearby. A bus stop is right in front of the hotel.

Ovaj elegantni, tradicionalni hotel ima veliki spa-centar s pogledom na planine te brojnim terapijama, wellness programima i kozmetičkim tretmanima. Nagrađivani restoran poslužuje jela štajerske kuhinje s proizvodima s okolnih farmi. Također u ponudi ima brojna vrhunska vina. Za lijepa vremena gosti mogu ručati na terasi u vrtu s ružama. text_eng: Located in the centre of Bad Ischl next to the Traun River, this family-run 4-star hotel features, a restaurant, a spa area, and free WiFi. The modern rooms at Hotel Goldenes Schiff feature an HD flat-screen cable TV with international TV and radio channels, as well as SKY channels, a minibar, and a safe. The spa area at Hotel Goldenes Schiff includes a sauna, a steam bath, a hydro-massage bed, a relaxation area. There is also a business corner and a bar with a fireplace. The restaurant serves Austrian and seasonal cuisine, including regional products, and features a riverside terrace. A varied breakfast buffet is available every morning. Free private parking is available at the Goldenes Schiff, subject to availability. Alternatively, guests can receive free tokens for public parking. The Imperial Villa is a 10-minute walk away, and the residence of composer Franz Lehár can be reached in a 2-minute walk. Bad Ischl Train Station is 600 metres away. From May to October, guests can rent electric bicycles and e-scooters at reduced rates.

The Nationalpark Lodge Grossglockner also features a hotel bar and a selection of beauty treatments. In summer, the hotel has its own hiking guide. For more information please contact the property directly. Guests receive a 10% discount in the on-site restaurant.

text_eng: Centrally located in the main square of Villach, this 3 star superior hotel features a bar and a terrace. Boutique Hotel Goldenes Lamm offers free WiFi access and a limited number of free parking spaces. A free shuttle service to ski resort Gerlitzen is also available. Café Restaurant Goldenes Lamm serves Austrian and international cuisine. You can also dine in the air-conditioned winter garden or, during summer months, in the outdoor area in the main square. The rich breakfast buffet is served daily in the new air-conditioned breakfast room on the first floor. It includes organic dishes and products suitable for diabetics. Guests receive discounts on ski passes and ski rental as well as discounts for the KärntenTherme spa. The Congress Centre and the main train station are only a few minutes’ walk away from Hotel Goldenes Lamm. The nearest airport is Klagenfurt Airport, 37 km from the hotel.
text_hr: Ovaj vrhunski hotel s 3 zvjezdice sadrži bar i terasu te se nalazi na glavnom trgu u centru Villacha. U kafiću i restoranu u okviru hotela Goldenes Lamm poslužuju se jela austrijske i međunarodne kuhinje. Gosti također mogu uživati u jelima u klimatiziranom zimskom vrtu, a u ljetnim mjesecima mogu objedovati u vanjskom prostoru na glavnom trgu. U klimatiziranoj blagovaonici na 1. katu svakodnevno se poslužuje obilan bife doručak. Doručak uključuje organska jela, u kojima mogu uživati i dijabetičari. Gosti ostvaruju popust na skijaške propusnice, najam skijaške opreme i ulaz u terme Kärnten. Hotel Goldenes Lamm smješten je na kratkoj pješačkoj udaljenosti od Kongresnog centra i Glavnog željezničkog kolodvora. Zračna luka Klagenfurt udaljena je 37 km od objekta.

text_eng: Altstadthotel Weisse Taube is located in a historic building dating from 1365 in the heart of Salzburg’s Old Town. All major sights are only a few steps away, and the closest bus stop can be found within 150 metres. Free WiFi is available in all areas. Hotel Weisse Taube offers rooms with cable TV, tea and coffee-making facilities, and a bathroom with a shower or bath. Daily newspapers and magazines are also at guests´ disposal. A rich buffet breakfast, comprising regional breads, jams and pastries and a selection of hams and cheeses, can be enjoyed every morning. Concert tickets and tickets for sightseeing tours are available at Altstadthotel Weisse Taube’s reception. Bus lines 3, 5 and 6 arrive from the train station to the hotel within a 10-minute ride (Mozartsteg Bus Stop). Bus line 10 leaves from the airport and arrives within 20 to 25 minutes.
text_hr: Altstadthotel Weisse Taube nalazi se u povijesnoj zgradi iz 1365. godine, u srcu stare gradske jezgre Salzburga. Sve glavne znamenitosti udaljene su svega nekoliko koraka, a najbliže stajalište lokalnog autobusa smješteno je 150 metara od hotela. U cijelom je objektu dostupan besplatan WiFi. Hotel Weisse Taube nudi sobe s TV-om s kabelskim programima, priborom za pripremu kave/čaja te vlastitom kupaonicom s tušem ili kadom. Gostima su na raspolaganju dnevne novine i časopisi. Svakog jutra poslužuje se obilan švedski stol za doručak, koji se sastoji od regionalnih vrsta kruha, džemova, peciva, šunke i sireva. Na recepciji hotela Altstadthotel Weisse Taube moguće je kupiti karte za koncerte i turističke obilaske. Autobusne linije 3, 5 i 6 voze 10 minuta od željezničkog kolodvora do stajališta Mozartsteg, u blizini hotela. Od zračne luke do hotela stiže se za 20 - 25 minuta autobusom na liniji 10.

text_eng: The family-run The Mozart Hotel by HeymCollections enjoys a central location in Salzburg, only a 10-minute walk from the Old Town with all major sights, the Getreidegasse and the Hohensalzburg Fortress, and a 5-minute walk from the Mirabell Gardens. Free WiFi is available. Featuring a boutique-style, all bright rooms are tastefully furnished and feature satellite TV, a minibar and a bathroom with a shower or bathtub, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Rooms on the upper floors boast impressive views of Salzburg's roofs and its mountains. Our hotel prices include a full breakfast buffet with many regional specialties and fresh eggs of choice. Our Bar and Bistro are open daily from 12 am and serve delicious small bites called Salzburg Tapas and a great selection of drinks and cocktails Paid private parking is possible on site (subject to availability) and a public underground car park is available nearby. The Wolf-Dietrich Bus Stop (line 21, 22 and 2) is opposite of the hotel, offering direct connection to Salzburg Train Station. The train station is also a 10-minute walk away.
text_hr: Obiteljski vođeni hotel Mozart smješten je u centru Salzburga, svega 10 minuta hoda od stare gradske jezgre sa znamenitostima, ulice Getreidegasse i palače Hohensalzburg te 5 minuta hoda od vrtova Mirabell. Dostupan je besplatan WiFi. Sve svijetle butik sobe elegantno su namještene te sadrže TV sa satelitskim programima, minibar te kupaonicu s tušem ili kadom, besplatnim kozmetičkim priborom i sušilom za kosu. Sobe na gornjem katu imaju impresivan pogled na krovove Salzburga i planine. Gosti mogu birati između 2 različita doručka, uključujući regionalne proizvode, a oni uključuju bife doručak sa svježim jelima od jaja i kontinentalni doručak. Sala za doručak Rote Salon svakodnevno je otvorena od 07:30 do 10:30 sati i tijekom dana se može koristiti u poslovne svrhe. U sklopu objekta na raspolaganju je besplatno privatno parkiralište (ovisno o raspoloživosti), a u blizini se nalazi i javno podzemno parkiralište. Autobusno stajalište Wolf-Dietrich (linije 21, 22 i 2) nalazi se preko puta hotela i s njega voze linije do Željezničkog kolodvora Salzburg. Željeznička stanica nalazi se na 10 minuta hoda od objekta.

This hostel is perhaps in the best location, and certainly in the most beautiful! Hey, we have rooms with a view!

We have 41 rooms each with 4 beds (2 bunkbeds)! All rooms are en-suite (with shower & WC) and equipped with wardrobes & lockers.

Facilities include free wifi, tourist info, laundromat, a bright breakfast room, breakfast in the garden during the summer months, free & secure parking in front of the house, free stuff for use (boccia, nordic walking poles, boardgames, frisbees, soccerball, etc.)

No curfew owing to key cards. 24h access and check-in (please let us know should you plan to arrive after 22:00!).
Situated close to the centre of Vienna, Palace Hostel Schlossherberge is set in a large garden overlooking Vienna. Guests can relax on one of the terraces and enjoy the panoramic views. All rooms at the Schlossherberge Palace Hostel have a great view of the surrounding gardens and come with a private bathroom. During sunny weather breakfast can be enjoyed on the terrace. Fair Trade and organic products are mainly used. A games room and a children's playground are on site. The guest house offers bicycle rental, a mini golf course and a ping-pong table. Palace Hostel Schlossherberge is 25 minutes away from the city centre. Guests can park their cars free of charge in front of the hostel. There is free WiFi in public areas.
text_hr: Hostel Palace Schlossherberge smješten je blizu središta Beča, u velikom vrtu s pogledom na Beč. Gosti se mogu opustiti na terasama i uživati u panoramskom pogledu na okolicu. Sve sobe hostela Schlossherberge Palace uključuju odličan pogled na okolne vrtove i imaju vlastitu kupaonicu. Za lijepa vremena doručak se poslužuje na terasi. U ovom se hostelu za pripremu jela uglavnom koriste organske namirnice i namirnice s certifikatom Fair Trade. Djeca se mogu zabaviti u igraonici i na igralištu u okviru objekta. U hostelu je moguć i najam bicikala, a gostima su također dostupni sadržaji za mini golf te stolni tenis. Hostel Palace Schlossherberge udaljen je 25 minuta od središta grada. Ako pak poželite male obroke, imate kavana/kafić. Završite dan uz piće u baru/salonu. Doručak (švedski stol) dostupan je svaki dan od 7.00 do 11.00 uz nadoplatu. Iskoristite mogućnosti za rekreaciju uz rekreacijski klub ili druge pogodnosti kao što su besplatan bežični pristup internetu i usluge recepcionara za osobne usluge (concierge). Ovaj hotel nudi dodatne pogodnosti koje uključuju čuvanje djece / brigu o djeci (uz nadoplatu), usluge vjenčanja i upotrebu obližnjega centra za fitness uz popust. Gosti se do obližnjih odredišta mogu voziti autobusom (uz nadoplatu). Gosti mogu koristiti prednosti koje uključuju besplatan pristup žičanom internetu, 24-satni poslovni centar i usluge limuzine / prijevoza automobilom. Uz nadoplatu se nudi prijevoz od/do zračne luke (dostupno 24 sata) i prijevoz od željezničkog kolodvora.
																Osjećat ćete se kao kod kuće u jednoj od 138 soba/e/i s klimatizacijom, koje nude i minibarove te LCD televizore. Vaš krevet ima udoban madrac (krevetu s nadmadracem) i luksuzna posteljina. Zabavljat će vas satelitskim TV, a ostat ćete povezani sa svijetom uz besplatni žičani i bežični pristup internetu. Privatne kupaonice opremljene su zasebnim kadama i tuševima, a nude i bidee te sušila za kosu.

text_eng:
Enjoy international cuisine at Garden Grille Restaurant, a restaurant where you can take in the garden view and dine alfresco. Or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6:30 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Take advantage of recreation opportunities including a sauna and a 24-hour fitness center. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, wedding services, and a fireplace in the lobby. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the complimentary area shuttle. Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Vienna? This hotel has facilities measuring 5425 square feet (504 square meters), including a conference center. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.
																Make yourself at home in one of the 173 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and premium TV channels provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.
text_hr:

Doručak (švedski stol) dostupan je svaki dan od 6.30 do 10.30 uz nadoplatu. Iskoristite rekreacijske mogućnosti uz saunu i 24-satni fitness centar. Ovaj hotel nudi dodatne pogodnosti koje uključuju besplatan bežični pristup internetu, usluge vjenčanja i kamin u predvorju. Do obližnjih atrakcija možete lako stići besplatnim autobusom. Gosti mogu koristiti prednosti koje uključuju 24-satni poslovni centar, besplatne novine u predvorju i 24-satno radno vrijeme recepcije. Planirate neko događanje u mjestu Beč? Ovaj objekt (ovaj hotel) ima prostore površine 5425 kvadr. st. (504 m²), koji se sastoje od kongresnoga centra. Prijevoz od/do zračne luke (dostupno 24 sata) nudi se uz nadoplatu. U ponudi je i samostalno parkiranje (podložno naknadama).

Krevet u vašoj sobi ima udoban madrac (krevetu s nadmadracem). Zabavljat će vas premijske TV kanale, a ostat ćete povezani sa svijetom uz besplatni žičani i bežični pristup internetu. text_eng: Only a 3-minute walk away from the Zeller Bergbahn cable car, which provides access to the Schmittenhöhe skiing and hiking area, Hotel Neue Post enjoys an exceptional location in the heart of the old town of Zell am See. Breakfast is available in the mornings and dining options include the Cäsar and the Basmati restaurants, both found 10 metres from the property. Groceries can be purchased in an Aydin shop 10 metres away, a Spar supermarket 50 metres off or a Billa one 80 metres from the property. This recently renovated and enlarged hotel is surrounded by a castle park and the hotel garden. It offers a hotel restaurant, a bar, a well-stocked grocery store, a lobby, a fireplace lounge, and a traditional wooden lounge. Free wireless LAN access is available in the public area and in most rooms. A parking garage is also available. The 1,000 m² spa area features a hot tub, a Finnish sauna, a sanarium, a steam bath, infrared and light therapy, a “shower temple”, oxygen therapy, and a relaxation room by the waterfall. The hotel also has a solarium, a fitness centre, and a big garden with a heated, glass-covered pool (open all year) and a sunbathing lawn. Massages and beauty treatments are also available. The spacious and cosy rooms are equipped with many amenities. All rooms are non-smoking. Smoking is only allowed on the balconies or at the hotel bar. Leisure options at Hotel Neue Post include a library, video games, board games, tabletop football, and a big-screen TV with a projector. Lake Zell and the train station are also only a 3-minute walk away. The hotel is located at the beginning of Zell am See’s pedestrian zone.
text_hr: Hotel Neue Post nalazi se na iznimnoj lokaciji, u srcu stare jezgre grada Zell am See i na samo 3 minute hoda od žičare Zeller Bergbahn, koja pruža pristup području za skijanje te pješačenje Schmittenhöhe. Doručak se poslužuje u jutarnjim satima, a restorani Cäsar i Basmati smješteni su 10 metara od objekta. Trgovina prehrambenih proizvoda Aydin udaljena je 10 metara, supermarket Spar 50 metara, a Billa 80 metara od objekta. Hotel je nedavno obnovljen i proširen te je okružen parkom dvorca i hotelskim vrtom. U sklopu hotela gostima su na raspolaganju restoran, bar, dobro opskrbljena trgovina prehrambenih proizvoda, predvorje, salon s kaminom i tradicionalni drveni salon. Besplatni WiFi dostupan je u zajedničkim prostorijama i većini soba. Hotel obuhvaća parkiralište u garaži. Spa centar prostire se na 1 000 četvornih metara i nudi hidromasažnu kadu, finsku saunu, sanarium, parnu kupku, terapiju svjetlom i infracrvenim svjetlom, „hram tuševa“, terapiju kisikom te salu za opuštanje s vodopadom. Hotel obuhvaća i solarij, fitness centar te veliki vrt s grijanim bazenom natkrivenim staklom (otvoren tijekom cijele godine) i travnjakom za sunčanje. Gosti također mogu dogovoriti masažne i kozmetičke tretmane. Prostrane i ugodne sobe uključuju brojne sadržaje. U svim je sobama zabranjeno pušenje. Pušenje je dopušteno samo na balkonima ili u hotelskom baru. U hotelu Neue Post gostima su također na raspolaganju knjižnica, videoigre, društvene igre, stolni nogomet i TV velikog ekrana s projektorom. Jezero Zell i željeznička postaja udaljeni su samo 3 minute hoda. Hotel se nalazi na početku pješačke zone grada Zell am See.

text_eng: Only a 3-minute walk away from the Zeller Bergbahn cable car, which provides access to the Schmittenhöhe skiing and hiking area, Hotel Neue Post enjoys an exceptional location in the heart of the old town of Zell am See. Breakfast is available in the mornings and dining options include the Cäsar and the Basmati restaurants, both found 10 metres from the property. Groceries can be purchased in an Aydin shop 10 metres away, a Spar supermarket 50 metres off or a Billa one 80 metres from the property. This recently renovated and enlarged hotel is surrounded by a castle park and the hotel garden. It offers a hotel restaurant, a bar, a well-stocked grocery store, a lobby, a fireplace lounge, and a traditional wooden lounge. Free wireless LAN access is available in the public area and in most rooms. A parking garage is also available. The 1,000 m² spa area features a hot tub, a Finnish sauna, a sanarium, a steam bath, infrared and light therapy, a “shower temple”, oxygen therapy, and a relaxation room by the waterfall. The hotel also has a solarium, a fitness centre, and a big garden with a heated, glass-covered pool (open all year) and a sunbathing lawn. Massages and beauty treatments are also available. The spacious and cosy rooms are equipped with many amenities. All rooms are non-smoking. Smoking is only allowed on the balconies or at the hotel bar. Leisure options at Hotel Neue Post include a library, video games, board games, tabletop football, and a big-screen TV with a projector. Lake Zell and the train station are also only a 3-minute walk away. The hotel is located at the beginning of Zell am See’s pedestrian zone.
text_hr: Hotel Neue Post nalazi se na iznimnoj lokaciji, u srcu stare jezgre grada Zell am See i na samo 3 minute hoda od žičare Zeller Bergbahn, koja pruža pristup području za skijanje te pješačenje Schmittenhöhe. Doručak se poslužuje u jutarnjim satima, a restorani Cäsar i Basmati smješteni su 10 metara od objekta. Trgovina prehrambenih proizvoda Aydin udaljena je 10 metara, supermarket Spar 50 metara, a Billa 80 metara od objekta. Hotel je nedavno obnovljen i proširen te je okružen parkom dvorca i hotelskim vrtom. U sklopu hotela gostima su na raspolaganju restoran, bar, dobro opskrbljena trgovina prehrambenih proizvoda, predvorje, salon s kaminom i tradicionalni drveni salon. Besplatni WiFi dostupan je u zajedničkim prostorijama i većini soba. Hotel obuhvaća parkiralište u garaži. Spa centar prostire se na 1 000 četvornih metara i nudi hidromasažnu kadu, finsku saunu, sanarium, parnu kupku, terapiju svjetlom i infracrvenim svjetlom, „hram tuševa“, terapiju kisikom te salu za opuštanje s vodopadom. Hotel obuhvaća i solarij, fitness centar te veliki vrt s grijanim bazenom natkrivenim staklom (otvoren tijekom cijele godine) i travnjakom za sunčanje. Gosti također mogu dogovoriti masažne i kozmetičke tretmane. Prostrane i ugodne sobe uključuju brojne sadržaje. U svim je sobama zabranjeno pušenje. Pušenje je dopušteno samo na balkonima ili u hotelskom baru. U hotelu Neue Post gostima su također na raspolaganju knjižnica, videoigre, društvene igre, stolni nogomet i TV velikog ekrana s projektorom. Jezero Zell i željeznička postaja udaljeni su samo 3 minute hoda. Hotel se nalazi na početku pješačke zone grada Zell am See.

text_eng:
Hotel Doro City is built with modern tastes, elegant and comfortable environment.
Llakmani is owned by the family, which has tradition in the field of hotels and tourism
Located in Tirana, Albania, Hotel Doro City is just a short walk from the centre of Tirana and all the main attractions. The hotel is equipped with an exquisite à-la-carte restaurant and a bar. All rooms at the Doro City offer air-conditioning and Wi-Fi. They are modernly and luxuriously decorated and feature a seating area, a desk and a flat-screen TV. Private bathroom provides a shower and hairdryer. Breakfast is served at the restaurant each morning, while guests can also make use of the snack bar and enjoy a game of tennis at the onsite courts or order massages. The hotel offers 1x 3-course dinner and 1x non alcoholic beverage for guests staying longer than 4 nights. A gift shop is one of the facilities available, while others include room service, dry cleaning services and entertainment staff. The centre of Tirana is 700 metres away. Guests can enjoy a walk along the busy Tirana streets or a drink at the local cafe. Tirana features several parks perfect for refreshing walks. Main Bus Station can be reached in a minute’s walk, while the Mother Teresa International Airport is 16 km away.

text_eng:
Enjoy the mountains and the lake at first hand when staying in the Hotel Seevilla Freiberg Zell am See, and experience the perfect mix of pleasure, activity, and relaxation holidaying in the province of Salzburg. All rooms have breathtaking views of the Zell lake and the surrounding mountains, with the Kitzsteinhorn, Hohe Tauern National Park, Steinernes Meer, and the Kitzbühel Alps. Enjoy being spoiled with the delights served up in the café or the restaurant with its lakeside terrace, and create some free space for yourself when holidaying right by the lake, whether on a summer holiday in Zell am See, or a skiing holiday in Zell am See.
Located right on the shore of Lake Zell, Seehotel Freiberg offers a balcony or terrace with lake views in each room. It is just an 8-minute walk from the centre of Zell am See and the ski lifts, with a free ski shuttle offered in winter. The Seehotel’s light-flooded design rooms offer satellite TV, a minibar, a seating area, and a bathroom with hairdryer. Most feature a flat-screen TV. 2 saunas, a steam bath, a Kneipp pool, and an infrared cabin are available in the spa area. Guests can enjoy a wide range of massage and beauty treatments. The fitness room offers direct lake views. The restaurant features a winter garden overlooking the lake, as well as a lakeside terrace. It serves international and Austrian cuisine made from regional products. Half-board includes a breakfast buffet and a 4-course dinner with a choice of dishes and a salad bar. Surrounded by a 3,000 m² garden, Seehotel Freiberg features a private beach on the lake. Free private parking is available on site. In summer, the Zell am See-Kaprun Card is included in the price. This card comprises free benefits and discounts in the entire region.
text_hr: Hotel Seevilla Freiberg smješten je neposredno uz obalu jezera Zell. Sve hotelske sobe obuhvaćaju balkon ili terasu s pogledom na jezero. Do središta mjesta Zell am See i žičara ima svega 8 minuta hoda. U zimskim je mjesecima dostupan besplatni autobus do skijališta. Sve iznimno svijetle i dizajnerski uređene sobe hotela Seevilla uključuju TV sa satelitskim programima, mini bar, prostor za sjedenje te kupaonicu sa sušilom za kosu. Većina sadrži TV s ravnog ekrana. Hotel obuhvaća spa centar s 2 saune, parnom kupkom, bazenom za Kneippovu terapiju i infracrvenom kabinom. Gosti mogu uživati u širokom izboru masažnih i kozmetičkih tretmana. Iz dvorane za fitness pruža se izravan pogled na jezero. Restoran nudi zimski vrt s pogledom na jezero i terasu uz jezero. Ondje se poslužuju jela međunarodne i austrijske kuhinje pripremljena od regionalnih proizvoda. U cijenu polupansiona uključeni su bife doručak te večera u 4 slijeda s izborom jela i švedskim stolom sa salatama. Hotel Seevilla Freiberg okružen je vrtom površine 3000 metara kvadratnih i obuhvaća privatnu plažu uz jezero. U okviru objekta na raspolaganju je besplatno privatno parkiralište. Ljeti je u cijenu boravka uključena kartica Zell am See-Kaprun kojom gosti ostvaruju besplatne pogodnosti i popuste diljem regije.

text_eng:
Near Lisbon and near the beach !
Real Caparica Hotel is a quaint hotel that has everything a great hotel have.
On days that permit, you can enjoy the beach in the morning, afternoon visit Lisbon and its charms and evening dining in our restaurant.
Recently opened can choose your menu based on Sushi but not only !
Welcome...
Situated 150 metres from Costa da Caparica beach, this hotel features air-conditioned rooms just a 15-minutes’ drive from the centre of Lisbon. The 24-hour reception staff can arrange car rentals. Tiled floors and cable TV are available in all of Real Caparica’s rooms. They also offer central heating and a private bathroom with shower. Guests can start their day in the light breakfast room, which has the same green colours as the guest rooms. Costa de Caparica’s restaurants are only a 5-minute walk away. The Real Caparica Hotel is situated a 20-minute drive from Lisbon International Airport. The historic Forte de São Sebastião da Caparica is a 12-minute drive away.
1157/RNET

Centrally   located in Bur Dubai Bank street road 5 minutes walk to Al fahidi Metro station
Rush Inn is located in Bur Dubai, the heart of Dubai's financial district. Dubai International Airport and the International Exhibition Centre are a 10-minute drive away. The air-conditioned rooms at the Rush Inn Hotel offer modern furnishings. They include a balcony, cable TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with amenities. Some rooms have a seating area with a work desk. Breakfast and lunch are served at the Stadium Café. Guests can enjoy Indian dishes at the Manizil restaurant, or savour Pakistani cuisine at the Roshni restaurant. The 24-hour front desk can provide room service. Convenient facilities at the Rush Inn include a currency exchange and laundry services. Al Fahidi Metro Station is a 50 metre walk away. The Rush is surrounded by Bur Dubai shops and restaurants including Meena Bazaar.

text_eng: Apartmaji Triglav is situated in the idyllic village of Stara Fuzina at lake Bohinj. The vicinity and the view to lake Bohinj are splendid and magical during all four seasons.The property offers a restaurant, terrace and free WiFi is provided. Each unit is equipped with a balcony, a fully equipped kitchenette with a fridge, a seating area with a sofa, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower. Buffet and vegetarian breakfast options are available daily at the aparthotel. During winter it is an excellent starting point for skiing in the ski resorts of Vogel and Kobla, during spring, summer and autumn it makes a perfect place for all sports and outdoor activities fans. We know how to organize a great day for you. Senožeta is 3.1 km from Apartmaji Triglav, while Nihalka Vogel is 4.4 km away. The nearest airport is Ljubljana Jože Pučnik, 44 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
text_hr: Apartmaji Triglav nalazi se u mjestu Stara Fužina, idiličnom naselju na obali Bohinjskog jezera. Blizina Bohinjskog jezera omogućava gostima da uživaju u prekrasnom i čarobnom pogledu tijekom sva četiri godišnja doba. U sklopu objekta gostima su na raspolaganju restoran, terasa i besplatan WiFi. Sve smještajne jedinice imaju balkon, potpuno opremljenu čajnu kuhinju s hladnjakom, prostor za sjedenje s kaučom, TV ravnog ekrana i vlastitu kupaonicu s tušem. Svakog se dana u ovom aparthotelu poslužuju bife i vegetarijanski doručak. U zimskim je mjesecima ovaj objekt odlično polazište za skijanje u skijalištima Vogel i Kobla, a tijekom ljeta, proljeća i jeseni okolica je idealna za razne sportove i aktivnosti na otvorenom. Srdačno će osoblje gostima rado pomoći organizirati zabavan dan. Žičara Senožeta smještena je 3,1 km od aparthotela Triglav, a do žičare Vogel ima 4,4 km. Zračna luka Jože Pučnik Ljubljana najbliža je zračna luka, a udaljena je 44 km. Uz nadoplatu je dostupna i usluga prijevoza iz/do zračne luke.

text_eng: Offering a large spa area with 2 swimming pools, saunas, solariums, massage and paraffin hand treatments, Hotel Lipa - Sava Hotels & Resorts is located in Lendava and provides air-conditioned accommodation. Free WiFi access is provided. All rooms here come with a minibar and a TV. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower. Views of the Pomurje Plains are available in all units. Each room comprises a private balcony. A restaurant serving international as well as traditional Slovenian dishes can be found at Hotel Lipa - Sava Hotels & Resorts. The hotel's Aperitif Bar serves coffee and pastries during the day and a range of alcoholic drinks in the evening. The hotel also comprises a tavern with a summer terrace. Bicycle rental can be made on site. A tour desk with information on exploring the local area is provided. The attractions of Maribor, including the National Liberation Museum, Maribor Castle and the Cathedral of St. John the Baptist are within an hour's drive. Free private parking is available on site.
text_hr: Hotel Lipa - Sava Hotels & Resorts nalazi se u gradu Lendava, a uključuje klimatizirane smještajne jedinice te velik spa centar s 2 bazena, saunama, solarijima, masažama i parafinskim tretmanima za ruke. Dostupan je besplatni WiFi. Sve sobe sadrže minibar, TV i vlastitu kupaonicu s tušem. Iz svih jedinica pruža s pogled na Pomurje. Također, sve sobe obuhvaćaju vlastiti balkon. Hotel Lipa - Sava Hotels & Resorts u ponudi ima restoran u kojem se poslužuju jela međunarodne i tradicionalne slovenske kuhinje. Hotelski aperitiv bar poslužuje kavu i kolače tijekom dana te niz alkoholnih pića u večernjim satima. Hotel također ima konobu s ljetnom terasom. U okviru objekta dostupna je usluga najma bicikala. Hotel ima pult za organizaciju izleta, na kojem gosti mogu dobiti informacije o okolnom području. Na sat vremena vožnje od objekta nalaze se mariborske znamenitosti poput Muzeja narodnog oslobođenja, Mariborskog dvorca i katedrale sv. Ivana Krstitelja. U sklopu objekta smješteno je besplatno privatno parkiralište.

text_eng: Located in the "Terme Dobrna" spa park, Hotel Vita features a modern wellness and spa complex near Celje in Northeastern Slovenia. Free WiFi access is available in all areas and free private parking is provided on site. All air-conditioned rooms come with a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar, a safe and a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. The hotel’s pool area features indoor and outdoor thermal pools, each with a hot tub. Guests can also enjoy the services of the massage and beauty centre and the medical centre, which offers a range of medical programmes. Hotel Vita also offers a sauna area, a solarium and a sun terrace. Activites such as nature walks and cycling can be enjoyed on the grounds of Terme Dobrna. Ljubljana is 80 km away, while Maribor can be reached in 70 km. Ljubljana Airport is at a distance of 83.7 km.
text_hr: Hotel Vita nalazi se u sklopu Terma Dobrna u blizini Celja u sjeveroistočnoj Sloveniji. U okviru objekta gostima su na raspolaganju besplatni WiFi, besplatno privatno parkiralište te moderan spa i wellness kompleks. Sve su sobe klimatizirane i imaju TV ravnog ekrana sa satelitskim programima, minibar, sef i vlastitu kupaonicu s tušem, sušilom za kosu i besplatnim kozmetičkim priborom. U okviru hotela smješteni su unutarnji i vanjski termalni bazeni, a svi bazeni uključuju hidromasažnu kadu. Ovaj hotel ima prostorije za masažu, kozmetički centar i zdravstveni centar, gdje su dostupni razni medicinski programi. Hotel Vita također obuhvaća saunu, solarij i terasu za sunčanje. U okviru Terma Dobrna moguće je uživati u raznim aktivnostima, među kojima su šetnje prirodnim krajolikom i vožnja bicikala. Ljubljana je udaljena 80 km, a do Maribora ima 70 km. Zračna luka Ljubljana smještena je 83,7 km od objekta.

text_eng: Offering unlimited access to the spacious Terme 3000 Spa Resort with 2 indoor and 4 outdoor pools and a fitness studio, Hotel Livada Prestige - Sava Hotels & Resorts is located in Moravske Toplice and offers air-conditioned accommodation. Wired internet access is available in all rooms. Spacious and elegant rooms here come with satellite TV, a minibar and a safe. The private bathrooms are fitted with a bath or a shower and a hairdryer. Bathrobes and pool towels are provided free of charge. All rooms at Livada Prestige Hotel provide a private balcony. The area's well-known black thermal mineral water can be tasted at the spa as well as in most rooms. The hotel comprises three bars, with live piano music on weekends at the Panorama Bar. Hotel Livada Prestige’s restaurant serves traditional Slovenian cuisine including specialities from the Prekmurje Region, and international dishes. A wide selection of Slovenian and international wines is available. Tennis courts and an 18-hole golf course can be found in the immediate vicinity of the hotel. Bicycle rental is available on site, with many opportunities to explore the hotel's scenic countryside surroundings. Free parking is provided.
text_hr: Hotel Livada Prestige - Sava Hotels & Resorts smješten je u Moravskim Toplicama. U sklopu objekta na raspolaganju su klimatizirane smještajne jedinice sa žičnim pristupom internetu te neograničen pristup prostranom spa resortu Terme 3000 koji obuhvaća 2 unutarnja i 4 vanjska bazena te fitness studio. Sve prostrane i elegantno uređene sobe sadrže TV sa satelitskim programima, mini bar te sef. Također obuhvaćaju vlastitu kupaonicu opremljenu kadom ili tušem i sušilom za kosu. Gostima su besplatno na raspolaganju ogrtači i ručnici za bazen. Sve sobe u hotelu Livada Prestige imaju vlastiti balkon. U spa centru i većini hotelskih soba gosti mogu uživati u čuvenoj crnoj termo-mineralnoj vodi. U okviru hotela dostupna su 3 bara, a u baru Panorama vikendom se gosti mogu opustiti i uz klavirsku izvedbu uživo. U restoranu hotela Livada Prestige poslužuju se tradicionalna jela slovenske kuhinje, prekomurski specijaliteti i jela međunarodne kuhinje. Također se poslužuje širok izbor slovenskih i međunarodnih vina. U neposrednoj blizini hotela nalaze se teniski tereni i golf-teren s 18 rupa. U okviru hotela dostupan je najam bicikla pa gosti mogu istražiti slikovit krajolik u okolici. Gosti mogu besplatno koristiti hotelsko parkiralište.

U restoranu hotela Livada Prestige poslužuju se tradicionalna jela slovenske kuhinje, prekomurski specijaliteti i jela međunarodne kuhinje. Također se poslužuje širok izbor slovenskih i međunarodnih vina. U neposrednoj blizini hotela nalaze se teniski tereni i golf-teren s 18 rupa. U okviru hotela dostupan je najam bicikla pa gosti mogu istražiti slikovit krajolik u okolici. Gosti mogu besplatno koristiti hotelsko parkiralište.

text_eng:
The Ribno Hotel is very close to the Slovenian Alpine pearl of Lake Bled, in the idyllic village from which it takes its name. Its location - on the fringes of a spruce forest with abundant birdsong - delights all those who long for peace and relaxation in close contact with nature. The hotel is an excellent starting point for hiking and cycling tours, fishing, adrenaline experiences and other sporting challenges in the nearby area.
Located 2,5 km from the centre of Bled in the scenic village of Ribno, Hotel Ribno offers panoramic views and free WiFi access. Surrounded by a pine forest, this property offers opportunities for outdoor activities with 5 tennis courts and a beach volleyball court. Hotel Ribno is the first Slovenian Zero Waste hotel. Guests can sample delicious local and international cuisine complemented by a wide choice of Slovenian wines at the Ribno Bled restaurant with 3 dining halls. The property offers an outdoor terrace, a business centre and a wellness centre with saunas, hot tubs and massages. Bike rental is available, as well as fishing and hiking facilities. Hotel Ribno also provides a shuttle bus which connects the property with the centre of Bled.
text_hr: Hotel Ribno nalazi se u slikovitom mjestu Ribno, na 2,5 km od centra Bleda, a nudi panoramski pogled i besplatni WiFi. Objekt je okružen borovom šumom. Gosti mogu uživati u raznim aktivnostima u prirodi, a u sklopu hotela nalazi se teren za odbojku na pijesku i 5 teniskih terena. Hotel Ribno prvi je slovenski hotel bez otpada („zero waste”). Gosti mogu kušati ukusna jela domaće i međunarodne kuhinje te velik izbor slovenskih vina u restoranu Ribno Bled s 3 blagovaonice. Objekt obuhvaća vanjsku terasu, poslovni centar te wellness centar sa saunama, hidromasažnim kadama i masažama. Na raspolaganju usluga najma bicikala te oprema za ribolov i pješačenje. Hotel Ribno nudi uslugu prijevoza hotelskim autobusom koji prometuje između objekta i centra Bleda.

text_eng:
Rinaldi B&B is a chain of mini-hotels that encompasses the entire city of Saint-Petersburg, with each of our accomodations being located within easy reach of the nearest subway station. So far, these include Technologichesky Institut, Gostiny Dvor, Chernyshevskaya, Ploshad' Vosstania, Petrogradskaya, Sportivnaya and Vasileostrovskaya, but we are always expanding and looking forward to including other stations in that list soon.

Our first mini-hotel was opened on Moskovsky 20, on the 21st of April, 2003 and was named simply that - Rinaldi, not only because it stood right across from the first milestone of the great architect Antonio Rinaldi, but also because it was located in a beautiful landmark building that was worthy of his name. And now, the rest of our hotels are no different - all located in beautiful places that are both quiet and conveniently close to the major artheries of the city.

We offer not only accomodation, but also services in purchasing plane and train tickets, organizing various trips and tours, assisting with visas and transfer to and from our hotels. If you have any queries about what else we can do for you - write us, we might be able to help!
Moscovsky prospect 18 Rinaldi is located moments from the Fontanka River, behind a lovely façade, only 5 minutes from the Metro to easily access Palace Square and the Hermitage. The property offers a shared kitchenette equipped with a microwave. The personnel of Rinaldi at Moscovsky Prospekt 18 can assist with ordering tours and transfers. In the surrounding area, relax at the Izmailovsky Garden opposite, or the pretty Yusupov Gardens. For a more active time, go shopping at the Sennaya fashion mall, or into the past at the Dostoevsky Houses.
