text_eng: Featuring a free-to-use Laguna pool complex with over 60 water effects, Ljubljana Resort is set in a 7-hectare big park, 5 km from Ljubljana's old town. Free WiFi access is available throughout the property. The Resort offers sports and entertainment activities including beach volleyball, table tennis and fitness. A children's playground is located nearby. A large, free parking area is provided. Because of the proximity of the river Sava, which is only 300 metres away, guests can go fishing in the summer months, and the recreational trail along the river is ideal for long walks, cycling or jogging. Stožice sports centre, just 1.5 km away, has an indoor sports arena and a stadium. Basketball, handball and soccer events as well as concerts take place there. Breskvar Tennis Centre and Stozice Hippodrome are also only 300 metres away. Ljubljana Resort is easily accessible from the ring road surrounding the city and can be reached by public bus lines number 6, 8 and 11, which leave in front of the resort every 15 minutes until midnight. Taxi transfer can also be arranged. The Ljubljana Ring motorway is 1 km away and Brnik Airport is 15 km away.

U cijelom je objektu dostupan besplatni WiFi. Ovaj resort nudi sportske i zabavne sadržaje, uključujući odbojku na pijesku, stolni tenis, saunu i fitness. Djeca se mogu zabaviti na obližnjem igralištu. Resort obuhvaća veliko besplatno parkiralište. Zbog blizine rijeke Save, koja je udaljena samo 300 metara, gosti u ljetnim mjesecima mogu ići u ribolov, a rekreativna staza uz rijeku idealna je za duge šetnje, vožnju bicikla ili trčanje. Sportski centar Stožice, koji je udaljen samo 1,5 km, obuhvaća unutarnju sportsku arenu i stadion. Ondje se održavaju koncerti te košarkaške, rukometne i nogometne utakmice. Teniski centar Breskvar i Hipodrom Stožice udaljeni su svega 300 metara. Resort Ljubljana lako je dostupan obilaznicom koja okružuje grad te autobusnim linijama 6,8 i 11, koje polaze ispred resorta svakih 15 minuta do ponoći. Moguće je organizirati uslugu prijevoza. Ovaj objekt nalazi se na 1 km od Ljubljanske obilaznice i 15 km od Zračne luke Brnik.

It was a noble family residence up until 1956 when it was converted into a hotel. It is set in a green neighbourhood of Florence, next to the Fortezza da Basso exhibition centre and its park. Each guest room at Villa Royal is air conditioned. The rooms and common areas are all tastefully decorated with period furnishings. This hotel guarantees a friendly and relaxed atmosphere and an attentive service. The swimming pool is great for a refreshing dip after a day sightseeing around Florence. The car park and swimming pool are both available at an additional cost. Both Palazzo dei Congressi conference centre and Santa Maria Novella Train Station are 1 km away.
text_hr: Vila Royal nalazi se na manje od 1 km od katedrale Duomo, a u sklopu objekta gostima su na raspolaganju velik vrt, parkiralište, bazen i razni drugi sadržaji. Ova prekrasna firentinska vila izgrađena je 1700. godine i bila je obiteljska rezidencija do 1950. godine, kad je preuređena i pretvorena u elegantan hotel. Hotel je smješten u zelenom predjelu Firence, pokraj izložbenog centra Fortezza da Basso i njegovog parka. Sve sobe u vili Royal sadrže klima-uređaj. Također, sve sobe i zajedničke prostorije elegantno su uređene i imaju antikni namještaj. Ovaj hotel nudi ljubazno osoblje i opušteno ozračje. Nakon što provedu dan razgledavajući Firencu, gosti se mogu osvježiti u hotelskom bazenu. Parkiralište i bazen dostupni su uz nadoplatu. Kongresni centar Palazzo dei Congressi i Željeznički kolodvor Santa Maria Novella udaljeni su 1 km od objekta.

text_eng:
First Hotel built on Paris Charles de Gaulle International Airport in 1974, this hotel command a view on both Terminal 1 and 2. 
Situated next to the CDG VAL metro station "Parking PR", this hotel is only at a few minutes from any Terminal.
The hotel Mercure Paris CDG Airport & Convention is a 14-minute walk from the airport's Terminal 2 and a 20-minute train ride from Villepinte Exhibition Centre. Guests can use the free train, CDGVal, located a 2-minute walk from the hotel, to reach the airport terminals. The hotel features a fitness room and a heated indoor pool overlooking the hotel's gardens. The spacious guest rooms and suites have a decoration inspired by the world of Parisian high fashion. The rooms are all non-smoking and are equipped with an LCD TV with satellite channels and free, high-speed WiFi access. Each soundproofed room features air conditioning, tea and coffee making facilities and a minibar. Family rooms are also available. French cuisine and international dishes are served for lunch and dinner at restaurant L’Escale. Guests can enjoy cocktails in the trendy Escale B, the property's bar. With a 24-hour reception, additional facilities include computers in the lobby. Offering views of the runways, the 18 meeting rooms can welcome up to 180 guests. Private parking is available on site. Parc Astérix is 17 km away and the RER train from the airport provides access to Paris in 20 minutes.

Offering an ideal location for tourists as well as business travellers, Hôtel du Boulevard, a charming neo-classical building in typical 19th century Lausanne style, is situated a three-minute walk away from the Lausanne train station.

Renovated in 2014, the hotel is paired with Hotel AlaGare (400 m away), where a complimentary breakfast buffet is served in the morning. Particularly well adapted to long-term stays due to its quiet location and suites with kitchenettes, this establishment also boasts a concierge service for bookings made more than 2 days ahead of arrival and 24/7 reception service thanks to an automated system.

Wi-Fi is free throughout the hotel, and the rooms also include cable television. A complimentary public transportation card will be made available to you upon your arrival.

Please note that reception and reservation department are available 24 hours by telephone only.

The Caspian Restaurant serves Arabian, Asian and European dishes, made with fresh local ingredients. There is a 24-hour coffee shop and a pub that offers cocktails and draft beer. Guests can benefit from the hotel’s laundry and ironing service. Daily newspapers are provided in the lobby and luggage storage is also available. Dubai International Airport is a 10-minute drive from the Royalton Hotel. Deira City Centre and Burjuman Mall are less than 5 km away.

text_eng:
Centrally   located in Bur Dubai Bank street road 5 minutes walk to Al fahidi Metro station
Rush Inn is located in Bur Dubai, the heart of Dubai's financial district. Dubai International Airport and the International Exhibition Centre are a 10-minute drive away. The air-conditioned rooms at the Rush Inn Hotel offer modern furnishings. They include a balcony, cable TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with amenities. Some rooms have a seating area with a work desk. Breakfast and lunch are served at the Stadium Café. Guests can enjoy Indian dishes at the Manizil restaurant, or savour Pakistani cuisine at the Roshni restaurant. The 24-hour front desk can provide room service. Convenient facilities at the Rush Inn include a currency exchange and laundry services. Al Fahidi Metro Station is a 50 metre walk away. The Rush is surrounded by Bur Dubai shops and restaurants including Meena Bazaar.

Besplatan doručak (švedski stol) poslužuje se svaki dan od 6.30 do 10.00. Sjajne poglede nude krovna terasa i vrt, a možete iskoristiti i besplatan bežični pristup internetu. Ovaj hotel nudi dodatne pogodnosti koje uključuju usluge recepcionara za osobne usluge (concierge) i televizor u zajedničkom prostoru. Do obližnjih atrakcija lako je stići autobusom (uz nadoplatu). text_eng:
The Ribno Hotel is very close to the Slovenian Alpine pearl of Lake Bled, in the idyllic village from which it takes its name. Its location - on the fringes of a spruce forest with abundant birdsong - delights all those who long for peace and relaxation in close contact with nature. The hotel is an excellent starting point for hiking and cycling tours, fishing, adrenaline experiences and other sporting challenges in the nearby area.
Located 2,5 km from the centre of Bled in the scenic village of Ribno, Hotel Ribno offers panoramic views and free WiFi access. Surrounded by a pine forest, this property offers opportunities for outdoor activities with 5 tennis courts and a beach volleyball court. Hotel Ribno is the first Slovenian Zero Waste hotel. Guests can sample delicious local and international cuisine complemented by a wide choice of Slovenian wines at the Ribno Bled restaurant with 3 dining halls. The property offers an outdoor terrace, a business centre and a wellness centre with saunas, hot tubs and massages. Bike rental is available, as well as fishing and hiking facilities. Hotel Ribno also provides a shuttle bus which connects the property with the centre of Bled.
text_hr: Hotel Ribno nalazi se u slikovitom mjestu Ribno, na 2,5 km od centra Bleda, a nudi panoramski pogled i besplatni WiFi. Objekt je okružen borovom šumom. Gosti mogu uživati u raznim aktivnostima u prirodi, a u sklopu hotela nalazi se teren za odbojku na pijesku i 5 teniskih terena. Hotel Ribno prvi je slovenski hotel bez otpada („zero waste”). Gosti mogu kušati ukusna jela domaće i međunarodne kuhinje te velik izbor slovenskih vina u restoranu Ribno Bled s 3 blagovaonice. Objekt obuhvaća vanjsku terasu, poslovni centar te wellness centar sa saunama, hidromasažnim kadama i masažama. Na raspolaganju usluga najma bicikala te oprema za ribolov i pješačenje. Hotel Ribno nudi uslugu prijevoza hotelskim autobusom koji prometuje između objekta i centra Bleda.

text_eng:
First Hotel built on Paris Charles de Gaulle International Airport in 1974, this hotel command a view on both Terminal 1 and 2. 
Situated next to the CDG VAL metro station "Parking PR", this hotel is only at a few minutes from any Terminal.
The hotel Mercure Paris CDG Airport & Convention is a 14-minute walk from the airport's Terminal 2 and a 20-minute train ride from Villepinte Exhibition Centre. Guests can use the free train, CDGVal, located a 2-minute walk from the hotel, to reach the airport terminals. The hotel features a fitness room and a heated indoor pool overlooking the hotel's gardens. The spacious guest rooms and suites have a decoration inspired by the world of Parisian high fashion. The rooms are all non-smoking and are equipped with an LCD TV with satellite channels and free, high-speed WiFi access. Each soundproofed room features air conditioning, tea and coffee making facilities and a minibar. Family rooms are also available. French cuisine and international dishes are served for lunch and dinner at restaurant L’Escale. Guests can enjoy cocktails in the trendy Escale B, the property's bar. With a 24-hour reception, additional facilities include computers in the lobby. Offering views of the runways, the 18 meeting rooms can welcome up to 180 guests. Private parking is available on site. Parc Astérix is 17 km away and the RER train from the airport provides access to Paris in 20 minutes.

Open throughout the year, the easy-going Saint-Sauveur Hotel is ideally situated at the Sanctuary gates. Its comfortable and modern air-conditioned rooms are equipped with free high-speed WiFi, satellite TV, hairdryers and a safe. The restaurant offers high quality international cuisine and a buffet breakfast. It is renowned for the warm welcome you will receive from the staff. Shop. Car Park.
Hôtel Saint Sauveur provides 3-star accommodation next to the entrance of the shrines. It has a restaurant, bar and free Wi-Fi and there is also a tea room and ice cream parlour. Enjoy French cuisine at Bayview by Michel Roth, one of the hotel's 3 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink from the poolside bar or one of the 3 bars/lounges. Buffet breakfasts are served on weekdays from 6:30 AM to 10:30 AM and on weekends from 7:00 AM to 11:00 AM for a fee. Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool and a 24-hour fitness center. This Art Deco hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands. Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Planning an event in Geneva? This hotel has facilities measuring 18299 square feet (1700 square meters), including a conference center. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.

text_eng:
Offering an ideal location for tourists as well as business travellers, Hôtel du Boulevard, a charming neo-classical building in typical 19th century Lausanne style, is situated a three-minute walk away from the Lausanne train station.

Renovated in 2014, the hotel is paired with Hotel AlaGare (400 m away), where a complimentary breakfast buffet is served in the morning. Particularly well adapted to long-term stays due to its quiet location and suites with kitchenettes, this establishment also boasts a concierge service for bookings made more than 2 days ahead of arrival and 24/7 reception service thanks to an automated system.

Wi-Fi is free throughout the hotel, and the rooms also include cable television. A complimentary public transportation card will be made available to you upon your arrival.
This city hotel in neoclassic style is located in Lausanne town centre, 300 metres from the train station, and offers free WiFi. Guests benefit from free public transport tickets during their stay. Lake Geneva is 800 metres from the property. The rooms all have a flat-screen TV. Guests can chose between rooms with or without a kitchenette. Please note that reception and reservation department are available 24 hours by telephone only.

text_eng:
Centrally   located in Bur Dubai Bank street road 5 minutes walk to Al fahidi Metro station
Rush Inn is located in Bur Dubai, the heart of Dubai's financial district. Dubai International Airport and the International Exhibition Centre are a 10-minute drive away. The air-conditioned rooms at the Rush Inn Hotel offer modern furnishings. They include a balcony, cable TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with amenities. Some rooms have a seating area with a work desk. Breakfast and lunch are served at the Stadium Café. Guests can enjoy Indian dishes at the Manizil restaurant, or savour Pakistani cuisine at the Roshni restaurant. The 24-hour front desk can provide room service. Convenient facilities at the Rush Inn include a currency exchange and laundry services. Al Fahidi Metro Station is a 50 metre walk away. The Rush is surrounded by Bur Dubai shops and restaurants including Meena Bazaar.

Možete i ostati u sobi te iskoristiti prednosti 24-satne posluge u sobu. Doručak (švedski stol) dostupan je svaki dan od 6.30 do 11.00 uz nadoplatu. Uživajte u nizu rekreacijskih mogućnosti uz rekreacijski klub, vanjski bazen i parnu kupelj. Ovaj hotel u mediteranskom stilu nudi i besplatan bežični pristup internetu, usluge recepcionara za osobne usluge (concierge) te televizor u zajedničkom prostoru. Gosti se do plaže ili trgovačkoga centra mogu odvesti besplatnim autobusom. Gosti mogu koristiti prednosti koje uključuju 24-satni poslovni centar, usluge limuzine / prijevoza automobilom i ekspresnu prijavu. Ovaj objekt (ovaj hotel) ima 3 prostorije za sastanke u kojima se mogu organizirati razna događanja. Uz nadoplatu se nudi prijevoz od/do zračne luke (dostupno 24 sata) i prijevoz od željezničkog kolodvora.
																Osjećajte se kao kod kuće u jednoj od soba s individualnim uređenjem (ukupno 181), koje sadrže kuhinje s hladnjacima/zamrzivačima u punoj veličini i pećnicama. Vaš krevet ima udoban madrac (krevetu s nadmadracem) i perine. Zabavljat će vas LED televizori (36 - in) i satelitskim TV, a ostat ćete povezani sa svijetom uz besplatan bežični pristup internetu. Privatne kupaonice s zasebnim kadama i tuševima opremljene su dubokim kadama i stropnim tušem s tropskom kišom.

text_eng:
OUR HOTEL CENTRALLY LOCATED IN DEIRA  DUBAI.
 ALL TYPE OF MARKETS ARE SITUATED THIS AREA  LIKE GOLD SOUK,SPICES, ELECTRONICS AND TEXTILES, ETC...
THE INTERNATIONAL AIR PORT IS JUST 15 MINUTES   DISTANCE,  AND DUBAI METRO IS WALK ABLE DISTANCE ONLY.  WE ARE PROVIDING FOR OUR GUEST FREE BREAKFAST AND WIFI FACILITY ALSO. WE HAVE SWIMMING POOL AND RESTAURANT HERE IN OUR HOTEL
Set in Dubai and with Grand Mosque reachable within 6 km, Queens Hotel offers express check-in and check-out, allergy-free rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a shared lounge. This 2-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a desk, a TV and a private bathroom. All guest rooms at Queens Hotel feature air conditioning and a wardrobe. The accommodation offers a continental or buffet breakfast. Dubai World Trade Centre is 9 km from Queens Hotel, while City Walk Mall is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dubai International Airport, 8 km from the hotel.
text_hr: Hotel Queens nalazi se u staroj jezgri Dubaija, na 1 km od trgovačkog centra Twin Towers, a nudi klimatizirane sobe i besplatni WiFi. Objekt obuhvaća restoran. Sobe sadrže TV ravnog ekrana. Određene sobe nude pogled na bazen ili grad. Sve jedinice obuhvaćaju vlastitu kupaonicu s kadom. Također su dostupni ogrtači i papuče. Recepcija hotela otvorena je 24 sata dnevno, a u sklopu objekta smještene su trgovine. U objektu je moguće unajmiti automobil. Hotel Queens nalazi se na 1,7 km od trgovačkog centra Al Ghurair i 6 km od Međunarodnog kongresnog i izložbenog centra Dubai. Međunarodna zračna luka Dubai udaljena je 6 km od objekta.

text_eng:
Enjoy Chinese cuisine at The China Club, one of the hotel's 9 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Snacks are also available at the 2 coffee shops/cafés. Relax with a refreshing drink from the poolside bar or one of the 3 bars/lounges. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6:00 AM to 11:00 AM for a fee. Don't miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including a nightclub, a 24-hour health club, and an outdoor pool. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). If you'd like to spend the day shopping, you can hop on the complimentary shuttle. Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and limo/town car service. Planning an event in Dubai? This hotel has facilities measuring 21689 square feet (2015 square meters), including a conference center. Free valet parking is available onsite.
																Make yourself at home in one of the 288 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LED televisions. Your bed comes with down comforters and Egyptian cotton sheets. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.
text_hr:
U restoranu The China Club, jednom od 9 restorana u ovom hotelu, oduševit će vas kineska kuhinja. Možete i ostati u sobi te iskoristiti prednosti 24-satne posluge u sobu. Ako pak poželite male obroke, imate 2 kavane/kafića. Opustite se uz osvježavajuće piće u baru pokraj bazena ili u jednom od 3 bara/salona. Doručak (švedski stol) dostupan je svaki dan od 6.00 do 11.00 uz nadoplatu. Nemojte propustiti brojne rekreacijske mogućnosti uz noćni klub, 24-satni rekreacijski klub i vanjski bazen. Ovaj hotel nudi dodatne pogodnosti koje uključuju besplatan bežični pristup internetu, usluge recepcionara za osobne usluge (concierge) i čuvanje djece / brigu o djeci (uz nadoplatu). Ako želite provesti dan u kupnji, povezite se besplatnim autobusom. Gosti mogu koristiti prednosti koje uključuju besplatan pristup žičanom internetu, 24-satni poslovni centar i usluge limuzine / prijevoza automobilom. Planirate neko događanje u mjestu Dubai? Ovaj objekt (ovaj hotel) ima prostore površine 21689 kvadr. st. (2015 m²), koji se sastoje od kongresnoga centra. Na lokaciji se nudi besplatna usluga parkiranja.
																Osjećat ćete se kao kod kuće u jednoj od 288 soba/e/i s klimatizacijom, koje nude i minibarove te LED televizore. Vaš krevet ima perine i posteljinu od egipatskog pamuka. Sobe imaju privatne balkone. Zabavljat će vas satelitskim TV, a ostat ćete povezani sa svijetom uz besplatni žičani i bežični pristup internetu. Privatne kupaonice opremljene su kombinacijama tuša i kade, a nude i besplatne toaletne potrepštine te sušila za kosu.

Set in a Grade II Listed building, this luxury hotel is in Central London, just 2 minutes’ walk from Oxford Circus Tube Station. The Courthouse Hotel London boasts stylish rooms, fantastic international cuisine, an indoor pool and a spa. The air-conditioned rooms have modern décor and feature an entertainment system, flat-screen satellite TV with Sky Sports and Movies, as well as free WiFi access. Bathrooms have interiors sourced from Italy and picture windows. The luxurious Thai-inspired Sanook Spa offers a variety of indulgent treatments. There is also a sauna and a well-equipped gym. The Courthouse also boasts a stylish cocktail bar and a rooftop terrace with views of the London skyline. The Courthouse Hotel London is superbly situated in London's lively shopping and theatre district. The shops of Oxford Street and Piccadilly Circus are a 5-minute walk away.

This midscale non-standardized brand promises that your stay will be a success thanks to the unique combination it offers: the strength of a guaranteed quality and the genuine experience of hotels managed by passionate hoteliers.
The 4-star Mercure Paris Porte d'Orleans is situated on the outskirts of Paris, just south of the 14th district. Its location, a 5-minute walk from Porte d’Orléans Metro Station, makes the city centre easily accessible by public transport. Each of the spacious, well-appointed guest rooms are decorated in a modern style. Every room is air-conditioned and features a flat-screen TV, a minibar and facilities for making tea and coffee. Free Wi-Fi access is also provided. My Restaurant, the hotel's restaurant, serves traditional French cuisine in an air-conditioned, non-smoking dining area. My Bar is a cosy bar that serves a variety of drinks and cocktails and also serves snacks every day until midnight. With underground parking on site, the Mercure Porte d’Orleans is just 10 km from Orly Airport, 6 km from the Eiffel Tower and 5 km from the Exhibition Centre of Versailles.

Iskoristite mogućnosti za rekreaciju uz 24-satni fitness centar ili druge pogodnosti kao što su besplatan bežični pristup internetu i usluge recepcionara za osobne usluge (concierge). Gosti mogu koristiti prednosti koje uključuju poslovni centar, ekspresnu prijavu i ekspresnu odjavu.
																Osjećat ćete se kao kod kuće u jednoj od 48 soba/e/i s klimatizacijom, koje nude i hladnjake te televizore s ravnim ekranom. Zabavljat će vas priključne stanice za iPod i satelitskim TV, a žičani i bežični pristup internetu je besplatan. Privatne kupaonice opremljene su kombinacijama tuša i kade, a nude i dizajnerske toaletne potrepštine te sušila za kosu. U pogodnosti su uključeni telefoni, sef i pisaći stolovi.

text_eng:
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's coffee shop/café, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7 AM to 10 AM for a fee. Make use of convenient amenities such as concierge services, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and a fireplace in the lobby. Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. A shuttle from the airport to the hotel is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.
																Make yourself at home in one of the 42 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and coffee/tea makers.
text_hr:

Doručak (švedski stol) dostupan je svaki dan od 7.00 do 10.00 uz nadoplatu. Iskoristite praktične pogodnosti kao što su usluge recepcionara za osobne usluge (concierge), čuvanje djece / briga o djeci (uz nadoplatu) i kamin u predvorju. Gosti mogu koristiti prednosti koje uključuju poslovni centar, ekspresnu prijavu i ekspresnu odjavu. Prijevoz od zračne luke (dostupno na zahtjev) nudi se uz nadoplatu. U ponudi je i samostalno parkiranje (podložno naknadama).

Završite dan uz piće u baru/salonu. Doručak (švedski stol) dostupan je uz nadoplatu. Iskoristite mogućnosti za rekreaciju uz fitness centar ili druge pogodnosti kao što su besplatan bežični pristup internetu i televizor u zajedničkom prostoru. Gosti mogu koristiti prednosti koje uključuju poslovni centar, usluge kemijskog čišćenja / pranja rublja i 24-satno radno vrijeme recepcije. Planirate neko događanje u mjestu São Paulo? Ovaj objekt (ovaj hotel) ima prostore površine 2691 kvadr. st. (250 m²), koji se sastoje od kongresnoga centra.
																Osjećat ćete se kao kod kuće u jednoj od 415 soba/e/i s klimatizacijom, koje nude i minibarove te LCD televizore. Zabavljat će vas kabelskim TV, a ostat ćete povezani sa svijetom uz besplatan bežični pristup internetu. U kupaonicama su tuševi, besplatne toaletne potrepštine, a nude i sušila za kosu. U pogodnosti su uključeni telefoni, sef i pisaći stolovi.

text_eng: Just 200 metres from the banks of Lake Wörth, Hotel Plattenwirt is located next to the Europapark, a 10-minute walk from the Minimundus miniature park and from Klagenfurt University. It is reachable from the Klagenfurt-Wörthersee exit of the A2 highway. Free WiFi is available in the entire hotel. All rooms come equipped with a satellite TV and a bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. During the day and in the evening a sun terrace and a shaded garden invite you to linger. At the lakeshore you can find a boat rental and a beach volleyball court. The bus stop is 50 metres away. There is a bus to the centre of Klagenfurt (3 km) every 20 minutes. The ride takes about 15 minutes.
text_hr: Hotel Plattenwirt nalazi se na svega 200 metara od obale jezera Wörth, neposredno uz park Europaparka te 10 minuta hoda od parka minijatura Minimundus i Sveučilišta u Klagenfurtu. Hotel je dostupan autocestom A2 putem izlaza Klagenfurt-Wörthersee. U cijelom objektu na raspolaganju je besplatni WiFi. Sve sobe uključuju TV sa satelitskim programima te kupaonicu sa sušilom za kosu i besplatnim kozmetičkim priborom. Tijekom dana i navečer gosti se mogu opustiti na terasi za sunčanje i u sjenovitom vrtu. Uz obalu jezera moguće je unajmiti brod i igrati odbojku. Do autobusnog stajališta ima 50 metara. Autobus do centra Klagenfurta (3 km) polazi svakih 20 minuta. Vožnja traje oko 15 minuta.

text_eng:
All-inclusive rates are available at this resort. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities. Enjoy international cuisine at La Fontana, one of the resort's 7 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Snacks are also available at the coffee shop/café. Visit one of the 4 bars/lounges, 3 beach bars, and 4 poolside bars for a refreshing drink. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6:30 AM to 11:00 AM for a fee.  Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You can get some exercise with a round of golf or enjoy a lazy day at the private beach. Additional amenities at this Mediterranean resort include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Spending a day of fun is easy with the complimentary theme park shuttle. Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free valet parking is available onsite.
																Make yourself at home in one of the 212 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and DVD players. Your bed comes with down comforters, and all rooms are furnished with double sofa beds. Rooms have private furnished balconies or patios. 42-inch LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets.
text_hr:
All inclusive cijene su dostupne u ovom smještajnom objektu (ovaj resort). Obroci i piće u restoranima na lokaciji su uključeni u all inclusive cijene. Mogu se dodatno naplaćivati obroci u nekim restoranima, posebne večere i jela, neka pića te druge pogodnosti.  U restoranu La Fontana, jednom od 7 restorana u ovom resortu, oduševit će vas međunarodna kuhinja. Možete i ostati u sobi te iskoristiti prednosti 24-satne posluge u sobu. Ako pak poželite male obroke, imate kavana/kafić. Posjetite jedan od 4 bara/salona, 3 bara na plaži i 4 bara uz bazen i opustite se uz osvježavajuće piće. Doručak (švedski stol) dostupan je svaki dan od 6.30 do 11.00 uz nadoplatu.  Opustite se u spa centru sa širokim spektrom usluga, kojemu su u ponudi i masaže, tretmani za tijelo i tretmani za lice. Možete se rekreirati partijom golfa ili uživati u laganom danu na privatnoj plaži. Ovaj resort u mediteranskom stilu nudi dodatne pogodnosti koje uključuju besplatan bežični pristup internetu, usluge recepcionara za osobne usluge (concierge) i čuvanje djece / brigu o djeci (uz nadoplatu). Uz besplatni autobus do i od tematskoga parka veoma je lako provesti zabavan dan. Gosti mogu koristiti prednosti koje uključuju poslovni centar, usluge limuzine / prijevoza automobilom i ekspresnu prijavu. Prijevoz od/do zračne luke (dostupno 24 sata) nudi se uz nadoplatu. U ponudi je i besplatna usluga parkiranja.
																Osjećat ćete se kao kod kuće u jednoj od 212 soba/e/i s klimatizacijom, koje nude i minibarove re DVD playere. Vaš krevet ima perine, a sve sobe sadrže bračni kauča na razvlačenje. Sobe imaju privatne namještene balkone ili popločene dvorišne prostore. Zabavljat će vas LCD televizori (42 - in) i satelitskim TV, a ostat ćete povezani sa svijetom uz besplatan bežični pristup internetu. Privatne kupaonice opremljene su zasebnim kadama i tuševima, a nude i besplatne toaletne potrepštine te bidee.

text_eng:
For lunch or dinner, stop by Thyme Restaurant, a restaurant that specializes in Mediterranean cuisine. Dining is also available at the coffee shop/café, and 24-hour room service is provided. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee. Dip into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities including a health club and a sauna. This aparthotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Guests can catch a ride to the beach or shopping on the complimentary shuttle. Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and limo/town car service. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.
																Make yourself at home in one of the 175 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with refrigerators and microwaves. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, and LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature deep soaking bathtubs and designer toiletries. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.
text_hr:
Svratite u restoran Thyme Restaurant. To je restoran u kojemu se poslužuje ručak ili večera, a specijalitet mu je mediteranska kuhinja. Obroke nudi i kavana/kafić, a dostupne su i pogodnosti 24-satne posluge u sobu. Utažite žeđ omiljenim pićem u baru pokraj bazena. Doručak (švedski stol) dostupan je svaki dan uz nadoplatu. Opustite se u 2 vanjska bazena ili uživajte u drugim rekreacijskim mogućnostima uz rekreacijski klub i saunu. Ovaj aparthotel nudi i besplatan bežični pristup internetu, usluge recepcionara za osobne usluge (concierge) te čuvanje djece / brigu o djeci (uz nadoplatu). Gosti se do plaže ili trgovačkoga centra mogu odvesti besplatnim autobusom. Gosti mogu koristiti prednosti koje uključuju besplatan pristup žičanom internetu, 24-satni poslovni centar i usluge limuzine / prijevoza automobilom. Prijevoz od/do zračne luke (dostupno 24 sata) nudi se uz nadoplatu. U ponudi je i besplatno samostalno parkiranje.
																Osjećat ćete se kao kod kuće u jednoj od soba (ukupno 175), koje sadrže kuhinje s hladnjacima i mikrovalnim pećnicama. Zabavljat će vas LCD televizori i satelitskim TV, a žičani i bežični pristup internetu je besplatan. Privatne kupaonice s zasebnim kadama i tuševima opremljene su dubokim kadama i nude dizajnerske toaletne potrepštine. Među pogodnostima su sef i pisaći stolovi, a sobe se održavaju i spremaju svaki dan.
